item.text: 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas phal po chazhes
bya ba bam bo drug cu rtsa gsum po// de nas byang
chub sems dpo'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas/ byang
chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sams te/ sangs rgyas/
long ma na 'asa rnams sasargyas 'bum la/ dad/
por dag pa ni dzatsim zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyabashesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
nga
rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ngas rgyas
skya bzhi tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun ji tsam zhig tu
bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshags pa'i bag
khyabarda sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyade bzhin gshags pa'i ya shes ni ji tsam zhig tu bsamakyis mi khyab/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ritsam zhig du bsam gyis mi khyab/sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sas rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sas rgyas kyi rnam par thar pan dzatsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ut+pala'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
ban du brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi ya shis kyi byin dang ldan par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi gzi
brjid kyis yongs su rgyas par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la rab tu bzhag ge/ sas rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud par
mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid cheb nyid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs pa mdzad do// chags pa mad pa'i rgyud 'byam kas pa la rab tu
bzhag go/ sangs rgyas thamasacad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i riges rab tu rtogs par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du mang pa lngarab tu bzhagapa mdzad do//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying pos chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par gi cade khong du chud pas/ chags pamed pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs pa'i yud dang/ chos thams cad
la bsgrubs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'i smo na lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs
rgyas blta ba drang/ snying rje chen pos lta ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang/ byang chub sems pa'i yi dam dang/ spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyun chad pa med pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa skad cagagi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes
pa'i rnam pa gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal bcu sras
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na rnam par 'phrul pa chen po la rnam par sbyong pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nas nigs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la sku'i mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu bar s pa'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang dgos pas sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhi ni
brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu ston 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bsam gyis khyab pa rnam par spyod pa'o/sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnamA kyisangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs nitshod med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni brjod du med pa'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba nithams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyinges thug su
chud cing bstan pa ni bsgrigs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'o/tsa kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'dedag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyingasamatha' dang dbus
med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pani/ rtog pa med par rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang/
cad bus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyanan/ chos thams cad manyam panyid kyi spyana mngon par sangs rgyas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas spu
bcom ldan 'adus rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i snyan ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud pos mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs rnams
kyi shangs kyi sku mchod ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags shin tu ya
pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chod nyid ni/ sems can
thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dramigs pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
kyi 'phrin las ni/ chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing dus gsum chags pa med par thugs su chud cing rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dbusamad pa'o// sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs

rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgrih+pha pa mi mnga' ba la rnam par spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ cho 'phrul mi zad pa yang dag par ston pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
te bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bstan te/ bsam pa jil ba bzhin du ma pa dmigs par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang/ smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ rnam par rol pakhri ye shes kyi chos yongs su rdzogs te/ chos thams cad rdzogs par byang
chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
mtha'adang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi skad cig la
ye shes kyis mngon bar bsgrubs pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// bcu gang zhu na/ skad cig gcige la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs
su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tsho yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par
'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs shade mngon par 'tshong rgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su snyan pa'i
tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dus la bab pa shes pas/ sangs rgyas bstan bkur ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig kacir la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can je ltar 'dul ba'i tshul
bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi skusna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyun sna tshogs
dang rgyun brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khya mchog gi mthubyung ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar/

byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad byung ba dang/ mos pa dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa byung pa la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par
@#// 'tshang rgya ba sos su bstan pa ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par bsgrub
pa yad dag par bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di deg ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sengs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs tshos
bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba rnam par smin pa dang/ rnam par mi sman
pa mnyam pa nyid na de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin ba'i byang chu ba sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi
'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud ducho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las ma 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can mos pa jilta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yengos su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'das mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni de'i dus las ma 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yul dang/ glong dang/ grong rdal du gshegs ng ]
ni de'i dus las mi khra dar bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ni de'i dus la mi 'dug
bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan hing gdul dka' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba de'i dus lasami
'da' bas dus la lab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni de'i dus las ma 'da' bas dus
bab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'dingag
ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skyil mo krung gcig gis
rgyas par du gang ba dang/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su bstan ba dang/ 'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bye ba dang sku gzugs
gcig gis lus dang gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang/ gnas gciko na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur pa dang/ [“]ngashes
gcig rtogs pas chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ thugs gcig bskyod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa/// gcag rtags
dang/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang/ dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gas rgyas
par 'gerlapa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad dang me 'dres par bzhugs shing/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi dmigu pa'i
tshul gyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe mad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sengs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par sgrub pa'i yushos te/bcu gang zhe na/ 'jug pa med pa'i chos thams cad
la 'jug pas smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ lus med pa la lus mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ chos thams cad mi ga'is pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mngon par
sgrub pa'i yongashes dang/ sems can gyo methar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i yi shes dang/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshog
mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ 'jig rten kyi khams kyi yul ma rgyas pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang 'jig pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ yul thams cad mngon par/
'du bya ba med pa la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon sgrub pa'i yeshes dang/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa la chos kyi dbyinges su gsung ma yin par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ chos thams cad
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas 'jugaM pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mngon par skyabapa'i ye shes dang/ chos thams cad maskyes pa la skya ba dang
'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rtenacing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon barasgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mngon par
bsgrub pa'i yo shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu ba 'di dug ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa khengasasu dpa dag sta/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyus
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snyani dus gsum thams cad kyis su 'brang ba'i khengs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar madzod pa ni tsho
'phrul chen po gsum gyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tudabye ba thams cad la mkhas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khoral thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhir khengs su chud pa yin//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni thugs rje chen po 'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tumanyam par gzhag
pa ni dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtswa bar ni sems can rnam
par 'dul ba thams cad khongs su tshud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa ma mnga' bar spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gtsagi tun 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye bo thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi
ma gcig dun dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khongs su chud par bastan pa thums cad khongs su chud ba yin kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad
mad pa'i khengs su chud pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par daka' ba rnamA te/ bcu gang de ma
bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'jomasangashing rnam par 'thor ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i tshes bzod par dka' ba'o// mu stags can gzhan dang bas
kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i tshes brjod par dka' ba'o// 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad panas nigs rgyas
btsem ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan kha dus rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka'
kha'o 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skus khyab cing/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gtis pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyishin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod pard kar ba'o// gsung gi yen lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang/ thos par bya ba dang/ gdul bar bya ba don yod par tha dad pa yang dag par
mkhyen pa thog pa med pas bstanapa'i tshul du tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhi byung bani/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tuts+tshache ba'i chos brjod par dka' pa'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas de bzhin gshags pa 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skad bsam gyi mi khyab cing/ thogs pa med pa'i

tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra bo snyad kyi thabs kyis 'byung zhing/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba sbya'i bu ga thamacad nas 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras
rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos brjod par dka'aba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tuphru ba gcige la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tuphra bsnyad yongs su ston cing/ sangs rgyas kyi rkyen dang/ rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyunam 'chad cingasems can rnam par 'dul ba thog
pa med la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang gnod pa med kyang rdulashin tu phra ba de'ang yangs par m byas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chung bar m byas
par ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'iyashes mnga' bani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu chab 'i chos bzod par daka' ba'o// mun pa mad pa'i khams
de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa mad cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la/ sems can pha rol gyi bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas par
sal na/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shan turgya che ba'i chos la bzod par dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sus/
bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin rgya che ba'i chos la bzod par daka' 'o/ kyirgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
bdag de che ba rnam pa mas cad du kha nam tho ba med cing shin tud ga pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa bdag nyid che ba ni/ sngon gyi mtha'
nas rnam pa thams cad r khan ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sengs rgyas kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan
par 'byung ba'i bdag tred che ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamu
ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa sta/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ phyi medi mtha'i mur thug par gnas pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba mngacingashin tu rnam
par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rtan pa yang dag par bcos pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamA kyi
bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma blo ba med cingashin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dengos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par gzhag
pa gcig gis len pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ban/ rnam pa thams cad du kha nam tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mthar tshes kyi dbyings la gnas pas mnyam pa'i bsod nams mi zad pa dang ldan pas mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[“]ny+nyo rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba medacingashin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs dang kha dog mtha' yas pas/ 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad nasems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyod tshe bani rnam pa thams cad du kha nam tho ba med cing

shAn du rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pas bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs shing khyu mchog dang seng ge 'i nga ro 'byin te/ rgol ba'i nang na stag lta

ts+tso bu'i mthu dang ldan la/ chos thams cad bstan pa la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha nam tho ba med cingashin tu rnam
par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'dus nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig len yang/ mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhug sang
dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon shin tu sbyong 'ang mya ngan las 'das nas desridakyi yun ring po 'das kyang sangs rgyas la bskyod pa'i yon phrad par mi 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che
ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cingashon tunum par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams brjod dumad pa'i yang brjod du mad pa dag na bzhugs shing/ 'jig
rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'din gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis rjes su dran par byas na sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam+ba

kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha nam tho ba medacingashin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag ljid che bani/ rnam pa thams
cad du kha na ma tho ba mad cingashin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa la/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med//
pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams nisangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam
paradag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sa rog pa med pas nagashin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nithams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung pe

bsgribs pa med pas nagashin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po b.resashing/ pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa brnyes pas shin tu
rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnamA kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus tham cad du gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i thob pa'i semacan rnams la dus thams cad du
sangs rgyas bstanapa dang/ sems can sems cashes dang ldan pa rnams la dus thams cad du chos bstan pa dang/ sems can sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dus thams
du bsnyad pa dang/ chos kyi skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ya8shes khongs su chud par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cud du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus
thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus thams cad du chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang/ sems can thams cad
la thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thogs pa mad pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams
cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing sa thams cad du gnas pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'i tshul rnams te/ bcu gang
@#// zhin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ye shes rgya mtsho ma zed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin/
ka las tshad med pa bar s pas yashes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtshe ma zed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi chara mngon par 'babs pas ye shes
rgya mtsho mi khrod pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamA
nilen gyi mtha' thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang khyad par mnga' bas yerashes rgya mtsho mo zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad
sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par sgrub pas ye shes rgya mchomi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems dran gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sams dang
spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtshomazod pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thems cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtshom zed pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras ]
bcu pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtshe mi zad pa'o/ kyi rgyal pa'i sras bcu po 'di dag/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba 'di ne sengs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi mkhyen pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang
thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dunasengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang stobs bsu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'drin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta sta/ thams cad kyang blan med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ne sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad
kyang sems can 'adul ba yang dag par zhugs pa 'dra na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi denadu mngon par sangs rgyas
pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba la thogs pa mamanga' ba 'di na sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul
yin no// 'di lta ste/ mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshes la rab tu gzhol ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no//

'di lta ste/ ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur pa dang tshul bar gyur pa'i semacan la sangs rgyas kyi yulamu med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das ba ston pa 'dAni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di/
dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sam/
can gyi khams shin tubastan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi med pa sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' los pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adus rnams ni sems can thams
cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni soms can mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba'i nan tan gyi sgor mtha' yas
thaba'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag gis yongs su gzhog pa'i skor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par gyi son lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khamA
thams cad ma lus pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'isgor mtha' yas pa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems
dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das
pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni bskal pa yAngs pa de dang de dug tubastan cing brjod pa dang/ yongs su bshad pas sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa ste/ kyargyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas
pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di degani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la
sgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa yongs su bstan pa ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mdzad pa'i ng sems chon rnams la sangs
rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi mdzad pa'i dzesems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sa dang rludang/ ma dang/ rlung
gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n byon gyi rlabs kyi yul dang mangs
dmags pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas byang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamA kyi mtshan kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las sgrub pa// sangs rgyus btsem ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la dmagos par mdzad pas skyengasems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs
pa' nga sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrine las sgrub ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la
sgrub pa'o/// bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu ba 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso
khe'i chos te/ bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam chen pa la rab tu brtan zhing smon lam zhig pa mimanga' bas ji skad du gsung ba de ltar mdzad cing gnyis su mi gsung ba 'di ni sems can gyi gce bo'i
chos dang po'o/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzadu par rab tu brtson zhing/ skyid lug pa
mi mnga' ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba gcig ga gzigs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod dumed pa'i yeng brjod du med par
gsheg/ shing/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa la thugs thogs med pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gsum pa'o// zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos
snyoms pa dang/ dad pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos soms pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bzhi pa'o// gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
dag par zhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur rosAm du/ byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o// dge ba'i rtse bzams cad yang dag par bsgrub cing thams cad
mkhyenapa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug ga/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin la 'dzin semA can gyi gtso bo'i tshes drug pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bsngonas nigs rgyas kyis sud pa'i
sams su lus kyi las dang/ dug gi las dang/ yid kyi las kyis slob cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba mad pas bla na
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdunapa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sums rnam par dag cing 'od gsal la das pa/
thams cad du snang zhinge kun tu 'od 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams cad du snyoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni sems can
gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o// 'jig rtan pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i dega' ba thams cad la ma chags pa dang/ 'jig Nan thams cad kyis
gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas te/ sdug bsngal dang spros pa thams cad rab tu 'jom pa 'di ni sems can
gyi gtso bo'i tshes dgu pa'o// sdug bsngal gyi mi bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du dka' thub kyis ngashin tu gdungs kyang sla bar sams bsad pas//
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi riges yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang/ stobs bcu'i sa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug pa 'dan sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu pa//
ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos so// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa ra spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams me lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags
pa mimanga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang/ bzhengs pa dang/ bzhud pas chags pa mi mnga'
par rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston pas chags pa ma mnga' bar rnam par
spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam bar spyod pa yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' drang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ da ltar byang ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod
pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams ni chos kyi dbyinges ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho'aphrul chen po gsum gyis soms can
rnam par 'dul yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis kyang tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa'i
sbyor pa chen por rnam par spyod kyang chags pa mi mnga' bor rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams 'byam gas pa ma lus pa thams cad
du de bzhin gshegs ba'i chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa bsam gyis mi khyab par ston cing gsung yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sadras rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad babrang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par
brgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag mcho ga dom
pa drug cu dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga brgyus yongs su bzung pa dang/ rgyun brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam
par dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang tshi ga dang ya gi brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang bgatsha ba mi mnga' bas/
seng ge 'i nga ra chen po sgrogs pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa chen pos bsnyangs pa mi mnga' bar gyur pa dang/ chos kyi dbyinges ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grag
cing bsal te khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang/ dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni
da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyun mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin lasanistobs bcus brgyan pa//
sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos m 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu ba rgyun cing bsgrubs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod
yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi la rab tu rgyan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu brnyes pa// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur po/
dus gsum gyi tshes kyi dbyings ma lus pa thamacad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad ceg gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rab dumkhyen pa sta/ 'di nasengs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rkyena mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad d/ 'od zer de dag re re la'ang 'od zer

N+NaM kyi 'khor gyi dra ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams rtsed ma lus par snang bar byed cing/ 'jig rten kyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad mun pa mad par ston pa/ sangs rgyas
skye ba dang mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir me ldog cing don yod pa// sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med bas gnas pa med pa rang bzhin rnam par dag cing kun tu snyoms par 'byung ba ste/
'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyana mchog dam pa bla namad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhang mo 'dzum par ston na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zerakha dog sna
tshegs kha dog dum dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa/sems can gyi khams tshadamed grangs med bsam
gyis ma khyab pa rnam par ston pa/ glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa gzhan du mi'i gyur bar lung ston pa 'gro ba thams cad dushin tu gsal ba 'byung ste/ 'di ni
sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhadam 'dzum pa bstanapa'i rgyan mchog dam pa blanamed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi skun tshad med pa ste/ bsgribs bamed
pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa khyod kyi mthar thug pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi ba dbyanges la gnas pa/ 'jig rtenuthams cad dang ma 'dres pa/'jig rten
thams cad dnga'adzib mad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis yang
dag par spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang bral ba ste// 'di ni sengs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyana mchog dam pa bla named pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad med pa mnga' ba ste 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'ong ma
'dres shing rgyan du ma dang ldan po kha dog sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yur brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun tu thogs pa med nge thams cad du chags pa med pa/ 'od kyi/
dkyil 'khor bsgrigs pa med pa tshad med pa'i mdzodadu gyur pa/ 'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'din sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na
med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams no khe dogo mtha' yas pa mnga'o ba sta/ kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o// kha dog 'od gsal bo mnga' ba'o// kha dog
tshad med pa mnga' ba'o// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o// de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan
khams gsum du gtogs pa thams cad brel gyi gnon pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o// kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa b.res bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams ni kha dog bla na
mad pa mnga' bsta/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog rgyan mchog dmapa blun med pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ste
'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dag pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o// chos nyid kyi rnam pa
thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang/ khyad paro mud pa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes skya ba thams canganang du gtogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi mi senapa thams cad kyis mi snyen pa brjod du med pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs kyi rigs
dang rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n khyems pa chen po'i mthu dang rang bzhinagyi rgyun mnga' ba sta/ shin tudang ba yongs su rtog
pa'i rtog pa mi mnga' ba sku'i 'phrin las yongs su bsal ba/ blta bas mi skyo ba thugs shinetu rnam par bsal ba/ shugs rdzachen po mnga'u ba 'go khra thams cad skyob pa/ yon gyi
gnas kyi dam pa bla na mad pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang nathugs btsab can phon par mdzad pa sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes chen po byin gyis brlabs te/ bsod namA chen po yod+ma
su 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang/ shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar/
mdzad pas/ 'din sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang/ thugs rjechen po'i mthar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa thun mad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
bcu po de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa thunamed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' skyur ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang/ chos thams cad la snang bar
mdzad pa'i mnga' sgyur bas tshig dang yi ge mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i slebs pa mngon pa dang/ chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dngapo'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su sIn pa dang
smon la ma ji ltar bteb pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba lathogs pa mi mnga' bas mnga'o che ba ste/ 'di ni sengs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur pa'i chos gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug turab tubaskyod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rnam par bkod
pa grangs mdatshad med pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugla pa thams cad gcig nas gcig yul mang ba dang/ gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang/ gcige nas gcig tu bsdu ba
dang gcig nas gcig tu bas ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyag su bab tu bzhag kyang/ sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor cing rmongs par mi
'gyur la the tsom dumi 'gyur bar mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i yoshesakyi'ajig rten gyi khams kyi rgyun phan tshun dubyin gyis brlabs pa dang/ thugs skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par bstan pa dang/ bskal pa grangs med par brjod kyang yi ge shin tubastan pa zad mi shes pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams
cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang mi mthunapamed cing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'du bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin/
gyis brlab pa la mnga' che ba skya/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga'u chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan sa
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na sems can gcig gi rin du bskal pa brjod du med pa'iyeng brjod du med par skyil mo krung gitsog gis bzhugs na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku la mi bde ba mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/ gang zag de'ang mi bsnyel bas 'dul ba'i dus las ma 'da' ba dang/ gang zag gcig la dril ba bzhin du rim pa
rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi mo 'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sku tsho la mnga' bar byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams laskyo bami
mnga' pa ste/ de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim pas sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i glang brag gi don du yengs su skyong ba mdzad pa la mnga' che ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'dus rnamA kyimanga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nibajig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshege

zlu pa'i bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thoms cad du bzhud pa la thags thogrwa mi mnga' ba dang/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyeng ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'abyam klas pa

mam/ dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du thugs skacig gcig dang ldan pas khazhud par byin gyis rlobacing chos kyi dbyings shine tubastan pa khong du chud par byas pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo thog/
pa mud pa rab tubaskyor ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'din sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pas mnga' sgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul
ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du thugs skad cig re re la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chugalo ngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' cha la ste/ de la tshos thams cad mngon par
sangs rgyas pa'i ng gang yang med la mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i ng med de/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurab med kyang/ slob pa'i sa la gnas shing mngon par 'tshongargyabarayang mi brjod pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bsgribs pa mang bar rtogs par thugasasu chud bsasems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gsod pa 'di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan skya mchod kyis ngas rgyas kyi se 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis yongaso su grub par mdzad do// san gyi
sku mchod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de shangs kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do// shangs kyi sku mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de
lcags kyi skye mched kyis longs su grub par mdzad do// lags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bslab pa donasku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ sku'i skya
mchod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de/
'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'jig rten pa dang// 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do// de bzhin du
dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snul zhir sgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di na sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
sgyur ba'i chos brgyad pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i ba spyi'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzud par mdzad cing khongs su
chud par mdzad pa dang/ sems can re re zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa dang mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ de dag shul
ba'i/ sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas bskal pa grangs med pa zad par gnas par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs mad par gom pa
gcig gas phyin pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas de dag byung ba'i tshe'ang brjod du mad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
rgyud dang gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga de nas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod
du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang/ sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med payang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig
tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings bston pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang/
'dus pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa gcig nas gci'og tu brgyud pa brjod dumadu ba dang/ daltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod
dumad pa yongs su brjod par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa kun tu mtshams med par sems can thams cad 'od zhinge 'gro ba dang/ skyo ba'i skye mched

thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen pa bge gas med pa thamA cad 'byung bar bya ba la mnga' che ba ste// thams cad du 'dod pa'i langs gyochan pa pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad+mo'i rkyen chen pos brgyan pa'i seng ge 'i khri pad+mo'i snying po
can la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skyes byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad

kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma rar ba byon gyi rlab kyis rlabs pa dang/ dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig thams cad la'ang pad+mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par mngon
par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyi thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
( dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad me da cing 'byam klas pa dus kyi rgyur grangs
ba'i/ mad pa dang ldan pa// bstan pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa// blo tshad mad pa dang mos pa shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa skad cige ma gcig gis thams cad yongs su bstan kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ched du sgrub pa ma mdzad pa la mnga' che bste/ 'di ni sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyus kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur pa'i chos so// kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab po rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba
'di no yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams byang chub du mngon par 'atshang rgya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// yon tan thams cad
kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sems can yongs su
smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon pa yongs su
rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// zhang yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par
'tshang rgya'o/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzang po dang//
gzugs gyi sku blta na don yod par yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa
de yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste// sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan
tshe lag bda'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ bcugang zhe na/ mangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thamasacad byin gyis
brlabs pa med cing spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/ dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi bon gyi rma kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do// ma bcingasam grol ba dang/
gzung ba mad cing bsal ba med de yongs su rdzogs pa med pa'i ng thugs su chud la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dram par ng bstas to/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams
cad la mnga' sgyur ba de'ang yang dag pa de kho na nyid mnor ba rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang/ chos thams cad bdag gamed cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par
mi bdag yang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang ba la'arab tumkhyen pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ma 'grogs shing mtshon ma'i mngon par
shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang/ jiltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgro'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi
mtshan ma'i sku gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang/ zhing gi mchin ma dang/ rnam par spyod pa'i mchin ma zad ma reshes pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye
shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas mun pa med pa'i snang ba ston pa bano/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs
mkhas pa gsum pa'o// chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthar yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa
bam ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byang ba'ang ma yin pas de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa
brjod du med pas 'das pa dang/ ma byin ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skya ba'ang rab tu brjidicing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'din/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa ban pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i 'phrin las dang/ gsung gi 'phrin las dang/ thug
kyi 'phrin las kyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i ng mi mnga' la/ yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs shing rnam par phye ba med pa'i mthapa thug pa sta/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas
kyi pha rol tu phyin la bsang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul grangs med pa'i mdzod du gyur cing/ ba grang ba dang mngon par sgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang
'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud ba ye shes bsgribs pa med pas gzigs pa rnams te chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams chad kyi sams
can 'dul ba rnam par dmigs pa la rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs tshad med mu med par mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas
pa lnga'o// chos thams cad lta ba med pas thami dad pa dang/ byakhrag med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa dang sna chogs med pa dang/ blang ba med pa dang/
dor ba med pa dang/ rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang/ rang bzhin med pa'i ng mang
dag par gzigs pas thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas chos la mnga' sgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la//
de bzhinanyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mnyems pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
[; ]ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan dang gzhan mkhyen bar pa ba/ chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'dus pa/ gnas pa med pa/ dag ba'i rtsa ba
rnam par dag pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi skyon med pas dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tumkhyen te/ de la'ang rtem gcige gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ lo gcig gam/ la brgyu
'am/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang/ 'du bas rjes su bsag pa dang/ phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang/ nyi ma gcig dang/ yud tsam gcig gi dus dang/
snga nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang/ phyi dro nas sngadro'i dus dang/ nyim gun gnas phyi de'i dus dang/ nye ma bgrangs pa'i dus dang/ khyim bdun dang/ zla ba phyed kyi dus dang/ zla ba dang/
la dang/ la brgya'i dus dang/ bskal pa gcig gi dus dang/ tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyom pa'i dus nas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus su chos bstan pa dang
chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir ma ldeg/ rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ bral khar mi 'gyur/ bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur/ 'jig bar mi 'gyur/
ba g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ ring du mi 'gyur/ 'khor de na gnas pa nyidu'ang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di nasengs rgyus btsem ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thobs mkhas pa bdun pa'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus kha thams cad rtag du dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n mo 'jigs pa tshad med pa
mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa grangasamad ba mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad ba yang drag par mkhyen pa zad mi shes pa mnga'
ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen ba thogs pa med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o// thun mong ma yin pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa
mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mthar thug pa med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/ tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa
tshig gi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o/ chos thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o// bsam pa dang/ mos pa dang/ dbang pa phal pa bzhin du
chos kyi tshul dang rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod ba bzhin du sa mtshams med par ston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yong brjod pa med pa rnams mdo sde de dang
@#// de la thog ma dang/ tha ma dang/ dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ne sengs rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o//
du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang/ mang dang rigs su byung pa'i chos thams cad tshig dang yi gesashin tu dbyangs pa'i dbyangs mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste/ ming 'das
pa ma yin pa dang ming ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang/ ming da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang/ ming sems can ma yin pa dang/ mang zhing ma yin pa dang/ ming chos ma yin pa dang/
ming yon tan ma yin pa dang/ ming byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang/ ming sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang/ ming grangs ma yin pa dang/ ming grangs med pa ma yin pa dang/
ming skye ba ma yin pa dang/ ming 'gag pa ma yin pa dang/ ming med pa ma yin pa dang/ ming yod pa ma yin pa dang/ ming gcig pa ma yin pa dang/ ming tha dad pa ma yin pa
dang/ ming thams cad ma yin pa dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa dang/ phyogs med pa dang/ ba rda mad pa dang/ tshig gi lam med pa dang/
tshe sgra dang bral ba/ sku'i rnam pa thams cad ma 'byung ba yongs su bsgrubs pa med pa/ byas pa dang rnam par byas pa med pa/ rnam pa gcig ma yin pa/ rnam pa mang pocha yin pa'i ng
thugs su chud la/ brjod pa dang sprad pa thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog bsdus pa dag ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma mnga' ba dag go mngon par 'du mdzad pa mad/
pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go/ rtog pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa 'a gag pa dag go/ spyod pa thams cad la mi kun s par spyod pa drug ste/ 'di ni sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thathumakhas pa dgu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rapa dumkhyen pa sgra/ tshor ba'i
sbes pamed pa dang/ 'dushes kyi grangs mad pa dang/ 'du byed kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis nI bar rwa ba tu
mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyud med pa dang/ khams rnamaMsam dmigs pa nga/ chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang/ chos thams cad bskyod du med cing
rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' lta bu dang/ chos thams cad dben pa drang/ las med pa dang/ rnam par smin pa med pa dang/ spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang/ ma sgrub pa dang/
ma byung ba dang/ grangs kyis mi brjod pa dang/ yod pa ma yin pa dang/ mad pa ma yin pa dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
pa/ @#// dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa dang/ skyonamed pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ yongs su gnas ba med pa dang/ yongs su smin par byas pa med pa dang//
rnam par btul ba med pa dang/ sems can med pa dang/ sems can med pa ma yin pa dang/ srog med pa dang/ srog med pa ma yin pa dang/ skyon med pa dang/ rkyen med pa ma
yin pa dang/ rtan pa med pa dang/ rtan pa med pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa bsnyes pa dag ste/
nges pa dang/ ma nges pa dang/ log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam bar d gongab rnams la sto bas bcus thugs su chud pa'i yi shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi yul chen pa dang ldan pas song ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de
dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di deg ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ de dag nisangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig na
sa/ dang 'das pa drang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i rten thos dang rang as rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o// bcu gang zhe na// phyogs bcu'i
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba bstan pa dang/ byung chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa mu med po dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ kha dog tshad med pa/ gaN+Di brjid tshad med pa/ snang ba tshad med pa dbyangs tshad med pa/ dbyar
kyi yan log rnam par dag pa rnod mdu pa/ gsungabarjod pas rnam par dmags pa tshad med pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshar mad pa/ shes rab dung yashos yul tshad med pa mnga' pa'i
rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig skrun la phan 'degs pa mdzad de/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/
lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dubacas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// byams pa chen po'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa dang/ thobs thugs rje chen
pa'i sgo mthar thug pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// bsod nams kyi stobs dang mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dbang po rnam par sbyang ba dang/
cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la
phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sams
can rnams la lan kha dogs pa mtshod de/ 'dan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dang po'o// dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas la thos pa med
kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku tham skye bar bstanang/ sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa mig
yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pa nam mkha'i yul tshad med par khyab pa/ bzhad pa bzhino duskya'ang chags pa mi mnga' ba/ smig rgyu ba lta bur bstan pa// nyon mongs pa
mad pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhil ba/ gnas med pa'i yashes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chag dang bral bas rnam par dag pa/ rgyun shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod/
kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po ldan pa na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi baphrin las mdzad do// yid la bya ba byin gyi rlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'gre las mdzad do// rnam par 'phrul pa'i
mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yum skyo skyed pa'i
sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi yul kyi spyod yul chen pa laskyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis khri/
rten byin du brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ tingang 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dang de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'i
bar du thog ma dang/ dbus dang/ tha ma'i tshul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sa'adi le gnyis su med pa thams cad mthor phyin par byas nas kho mar 'jig rten gyi
grangs kyis skye ba yongs su ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad do// byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad dusangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams
cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig rtenathams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// chos kyi 'khoral bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad
dusangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten sna tshogs/ 'jig rten tshad med pa/ 'jig rtan pas kun tu mtha' yas pa/ phyogs
kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lasamad do// zhing gargyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de//
las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i ba jin rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ sems can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzod do// skye ba dang/
shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten dusangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzod do// sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang/ chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor las kyang songs
rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'din sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phralasaM gnyis pa'o// dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing/ gdung rabs thams cad du
ma/ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par sku tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad gdul ba thugs su chud pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing btsunamo'i
'khor gyi nang na bzhugs ba ston kyang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyi gnas la bzhugs pa rnams sgra dang tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtag pas/ dngos po
thams cad dngos po med pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang/ dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang/ tshul khrims thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyidakyi mthar thug par
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang snying rje chen pos 'gro ba mu med pa la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang/ byams pa chen pes sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtog par bya ba dang/ dga' ba
chen pos 'jig rtan brjod du med par khong du chud par bya ba dang/ btang snyoms chon pos sems la dbang sgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis rang yongs su
rgyas par byed par bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang/ @#mas cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed par bya ba dang/
'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan du byed par bya ba dang/ tshes bstan pa rnam par brjod pa rab tu brjod par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang/ 'gro
0/ @#// ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la rtog par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par smin pa yang dag par bstan pa dung/ ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems
[D1 ]can gdul ba dang/ yongs su ma sminapa'i sems can longs su smin par bya ba dang/ yongs su smin pa rnams tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang/ grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas ba mngon par
bsgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs
rnam par sbyang ba dang/ thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis mngon par spang ba dang/ thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen pa bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs
su brlan pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang/ rnam par dmigs pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyin ng du bston pa yan chad du 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med par sangs rgyas
kyi 'phrin las yongs su bstan pa mdzad ci/ yashas kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang [！ ]sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa bsgribs pa med par bsgrubs pa dang/
chos rnam pa gsum gyi thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' dang sku'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang/ gsung [”]'phrin las me shis
nyams pa med pas rnam par dag pa dang/ thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs
rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyus kyi 'phrin las gsum pa'o/// bam po drug cu lnga pa// rnam par rgyal ba chen pa mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor
rgyan rnam par phye ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba sangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas las bskyod pa dang/ 'ag
rten gyi mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'jig rten du gtogs pa thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/
'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sredapa yongs su bcad pa dang/ 'jig rtan nyon mongs pa byang zhing nub pa la yang dag par spyod par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi don rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir mngon par
'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang/ khyim pa'i tshul yongs su srung ba bstan pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs
su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen pa bstes pas sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu
khasal ba dang/ bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med par gyur par 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyod pa'i
du ge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par brjod pa dang/ bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan ba dang/ sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgor
brjod pa dang sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor sgrub pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal mtshan yong dgo/
par bsgrung ba mdzod cing mngon par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bzhi pa'o// don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang ldan pa tham
cad mkhyen pa'i leshes kyi mthar thug po rnams ni/ chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang bdud kyi
dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par dugadu ba'i phyir/ byin gyi rlabs zad mishes pa'i mthar thug pas/
mtha' rnam par spangs pa/ spyod pa tshad mdo pa rab tu brnyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang
dag par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khamasam lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam par bkram pas yongs su rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dam pa thob ba rnams kyis zhal du blta ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang/ smon lam khyad par can
dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dug par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo rab tu bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa bsams
pas byang chub sems dpa' brjod dumad pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub samasadapa'i spyad pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmigA
pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cadu tham der pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa khyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu bsdus
pas bzhugs pa// 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/ somos can gyi rnam pa thams cad dang/ zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang/ chos
ma/// kyi rnam pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems drab 'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ longs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang/
'dul ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus par mthar thug pa'i rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du mos pa ji lta bzhin du rnam
bar 'tshang rgya bas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldanu'adas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis tshad med pa'i
'khor lo dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i seng gab de re chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus bar man par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang/ chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i sgos snang bar byed
pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mkhyen 'apa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang/ ma shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshod med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang/ chos thamA
blo cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang/ sems can thams cad kyi ma kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis
'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thums pyad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod pa'i 'khor lo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad dang mi 'a gal ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang/ de dag la sogs pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrige brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
bas sems can thams can kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la bsam gyis ma khyab po mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ rgyal po'i gnas su gshegs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrinelas mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal pa
gnas dang/ lha'i rgyal pa'i gnas dang/ klu'i rgyal pa'i gnas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang/ dri bra'i rgyal bo'i gnas dang/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i
gnas dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gnas dang/ mi 'am cib rgyal po'i gnas dang/ lto 'phya chen po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang/ srin po'i rgyal bo'i gnas dang/
sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ grong khyer gyi
sgor byon nas g.yo ba dang/ 'od zer snang ba dang/ long ba rnams mig 'thob pa dang/ 'on pa rnams kyis sku thos par 'gyur ba dang/ smos pa rnams dran pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
dang/ gos med pa rnams gos 'khob par 'gyur ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba 'thob pa dang/ rol mo'i cha byad ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgro yid du 'ong bar 'byin pa dang rgyan snod
na 'dug pa dang/ gnas nas ma phog pa dang/ ma bskyod ma dkrol bar bskyod cing dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang/ bya sna tshogs mang pa'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang/ ldan
gtang mi bya zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams soms can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ba phrin las mdzad do// mtshon dang dpe byad
bzang po bstan pas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ yongs su gzigs pa dang/ rnam par
gathigs pa dang/ brkyang ba dang/ bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gshegs pa dang/ slar bzhud pa dang/ bzhengs pa
dang/ 'chags pa dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ gzigs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de// chos bstan pa dang ma gsung par bzhugs pas kyang/
sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul dang/ yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phul dang/ rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis kyang/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
ba chen pas shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
mdzad de// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gzugs blta na mi ngoms pa'o zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang/ sangs rgyas rnams skye bar dkon no// zhes bya bar yid
ches par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa ni bsod nams kyi tshes dkar pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o// zhes sangs rgyas kyi
spyod pa yi de la byed pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba yone no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi yon
tan bsngags pa ni mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i riges yang dag par bsgrub
pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mos pa'i tshul thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o zhes M
khong du chud par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gsheg pa na sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par rtog pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i gnas su gyur par sems pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhing thams cad na snang bar khong du chud pa dang/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas/
'jig rten thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad d// dad par byas pa dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ thal
mo sbyar ba byas pa dang/ rjes su bstod pa dang/ spyan drangs pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ mngon du mthong ba dang/ 'dzum pa byas pa dang/ sangs rgyas la dga'/
tshe ba'i sems kyis mos par byas pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba'i sgo nas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas
rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod par bya bas
kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa tshad med
pa bstan pas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par
byas pas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong brjod du med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/
mthu dang/ 'dul ba ji lta ba'i tshul las ma 'da' bar 'byung ngo// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi soms dung/ spyod/
pa dang/ bsam pa la gnas pa dge ba rgya che ba tshad med pa dog phyir mi ldog pa'i yul dang/ snying rje chen po rab tu bskul ba dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongasu skye ba ma
