0@#// pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ba phrin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dung shugs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'dinu sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni degon pa la bzhugs sam/ na bar bzhugs M sam/ dben par bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen pa'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ gtsog pu dgyas par paMzhugs sam/ sku mi snang bar bzhugs sam yashes
zab mo'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs tshad med pa la bzhugs sam/ sku'i yongs su spyod pa mi mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gzhan gyisami tshugs pa'i ye shes dang/ smon lam gyi tshul gyis mos pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyun mi 'chad par
'byung ste/ sangs rgyas lta yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas klu longs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs
rgyas gnod sbyin yongs su tshol ba dang/ sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang/ sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen [”]pa yengasasu tshol ba dang/ sangs rgyas srin po yongs su tshol ba dang//
sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyan thos dang/ sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su tshel bas kyang sangs
rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de// chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do//
sangs rgyas thams tsad brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang/ smon lam thams cad gci ga tu brjod
pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcig rnam par phye ste/ spyod pa tha dad pa brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
rgyun mi 'chad do// 'jig rten gyi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jig rten gyi ul du brjod pas
kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yul du ba rjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// nyin mtshan dang/
lud du la na man dang/ zla ba dang/ la grangs par bzhugs pa dang/ yongs su bzhugs pa nas/ de bzhin du bskalo pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
[©/ ]/pa'i bar du bzhugs pas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'phrin las brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'byung gnas lta bu// sems can
thams cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam par spyod ba lta bu/ sangs rgyas rnams la dad pa lta bu/ sems khong du chud par bya ba la shin tu mos pa lta bu/ dbang po rnams la/
sgrub pa lta bu/ sems can skye dgu thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad la mos pa lta bu// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu
zhugs pa rnams la skul ba lta bu/ gzhan gyi drongam 'jog pa rnams la ye shes snang ba lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten mo rdeg par ston pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun chad par brjod pa dang/ 'phrin las mdzad pa'i mthar thug par bstan pa dang/ chos kyi rgyud nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang/
srid pa'i tshul rtsa ba nas chad por brjod pa dang/ sems can thams cad skyo bar bya bar bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems su mthun par bya ba dang/ sku tshe'i/
mthab lta bur sems can rnams kyis shes par bya ba dang/ sems can rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad du dga' bar bya ba med par bstan pa dang/ sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i sangs
rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mnyes par gyis shig par bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan du mi rung bar khong du chud par bya ba
dang 'jig rten rnams kyi rtsol ba bskyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa'i sems la dgod pa dang/ yul du dran pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa dang/ skyo ba'i dbang po phyir bzlog cing yongs su dag par mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas la tshogs pa bskyod pa dang/ skyo bar gyur pa'i
sams la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i skyon 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad phyin par dgongs pa mdzad pa dang/ sku thams cad bshig
ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis sems can rnams yongs su gzung pa mdzad pa dang/ 'jig rten rnam par 'khrugs pa dang/ dregasashing myos pa'i sems can
rnams sdom pa la dgod pa mdzad cing longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dgu pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'a da' ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad na sum
can rnams skye sngags 'don cing du ba dang/ mya ngan byed pa dang/ mchim 'bade ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas she 'am/ thugs rjechen po zhu 'am
ded dpon chen po zhi 'am/ phan par bzhed pa thugs brtse ba can zhe 'am/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/ mgon du/
gyur pa/ rten du gyur pa/ blonamad pa bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur te zhi 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar dka' bo zhes rnam pa
de lta bur skye sngags 'don ba dang/ mya nganabyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ yid la bya ba de dang de dag gi
sgor sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa rgyun ma 'chad de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi
sems dad par bya ba'i dbang dang/ sems can rnams dadapas mchod par bya ba'i dbang ga sems can rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong bar bya ba'i dbang dang/ sems
can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang dang/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i dbang dang/ sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang dang/ sems can rnams
bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmigs par bya ba'i dbang dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mtshod rten dam pa sna tshogs su bstan pas/ phyogs dang yul sna tshogs su sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par bya ba'i dbang gis samaMs can rnams kyi
bsam pa dang/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsral byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zla dang/ lca ma yune dung/ nam mkha' lding
dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi'i gonas thams cad du 'dul ba dung/ mos pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du skyo gdung dang ring bsrel rkyen gyis rlob po// rang gi skye rnam
par phye ste/ sku gdung dung ring bsrel tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du mad pa'i yang brjod du med pa byin gyis rlob bo// de khazhin
gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba de'i yul dang/ phyogs kyi klu'i gnas dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za
dang lham yan dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang/ mi'i gnas dang/ srin po'i gnas dag//
tusku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod par byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring bsrel dang/ dbu dang phyag sen gyi mchod rten dang/ sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten la 'gro
ba thams cad nges par sangs dran par 'gyur te/ chos la rab tu rten par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la dad pa rab tu'athob par 'gyur ro// yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag
rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams byed par 'gyur ro/ mtho ris de dang de yongs su dag
pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po dang 'khor rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur
ro lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas byung ba don
yod par rab tu sgrub par 'gyur ro// chos dkar po la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i lam yongs su spong bar
'gyur ro// theg pa gang la dad pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dung de dag la drin du gzo ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'adas rnams la brten pa dang/ skyabs btsal ba dang/ mgon btsal ba dang/ dpung gnyen btsal ba'i sems bskyad par 'gyur ro// de ltar sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa sbyong ba/ bsod nams zad mi[“]shes pa'i yon gyi gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten du byung na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po rab tu bsags pas bsod nams kyi tshe gas rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di
ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs kyi 'phrin las bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin/
las rgya chen pa tshod med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshad gzung bar mi nus pa'o/
'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag/
ka/@#// ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing dngos po rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams bcu gang
zhen 'dilta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams ni lung bstan pa thams cad ston pa la gnyis su med par spyod du// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can
sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa la brtson pa rnams kyi soms dang bsam pa brjod du med pa 'byam klas pa rnams la gnyis su med par spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don
ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pas gnyis su med pa'i sku rnam par dmigs par mdzad do// 'dras pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ dra ltar byung ba'i de bzhin grashegs pa
thams cad la rang bzhin gces sumed par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// 'byung ba dang/ 'byung ba'i mtha' gnyis su med pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang/
da ltar byung ba'i mtha' gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gnyis su med pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gcig par
rab tu mkhyen cing ston pa thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'i// sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa dang 'dul ba mdzad pa'i rnam par dmigs pa gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cud sAdras/
rgyas kyi chos gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtswa pa thams cad dge ba'i rtsa
ba gcig ste/ gnyis su med par thugs su chud par mnga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing dungs pa
gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
bzhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams so// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyinges gnas pa'i yashes thugasasu
chud pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po ma nyom pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam ji lta ba
bzhin du 'byung ba la bzhugs pa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su mi gtong ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal pa mnyam pa
tha mi dad cing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rteg tumanyam par gzhag pa'i thugs la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
rnams ni chos thams cad nyams pa med par gzhol ba la bzhugs pa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med ba'i shugs kyis rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs
pa'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamAni rno thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pas grub pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pa ste/ 7rgyal ba'i sras bcu
po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ chos thams cad la bzhugs pa rnams so/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma
lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ da ltar
byung ba bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ tshig gi lam mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud mtha' dag thams cad mngon
poramkhyen pa dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang 'bring dang
chen pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtse bo rnams la bsam pa tshad med pa yongs su ma btang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang/
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ chos thams cad 'tshong rgya ba'i mkhyen pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/
'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta
bur dbye ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon
par mkhyen pa'o/// bam po drug cu rtsa drug pa/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyistobs chen po// stobs dam pa stobs tshad med pa/ stobs bdag nyid rje ba/ stobs thub pa med pa/ stobs ma nyam pa/ stobs
snying po dang ldan pa/ stobs mi shigs pa// stobs 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa sangs rgyas
kyi rgyal mtshan stobs po che dpa' bo chen po'i stobs te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku na pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi shigs ma chod
ba'o/ 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis sku tshe'i dbang po nyams par mi nus pa'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa'i me'i gdung bas 'tshig par mi
nus pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig par gtogs pa'i chu'i phung por 'grongs par mi 'gyur ba'o/ bdud thams cad dang/ bdud kyi sde thams
cad dang/ lha thams cad kyi dpung dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ droze dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am sridang/ lto 'phye chen po dang//
mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang/ sha za dang/ srin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dbung gis brgal bar dka' ba'o//
rdo rje'i rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang/ khor yug ga re chen po tsam dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi rde rje'i char bab kyang/ bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu gcig kyang 'gul bar mi 'gyur/ g.yo bar mi 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga' ba'o//
bzhugs sum/ bzhengs sam/ bzhud dam/ gzims kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ga na bzhugs pa'i yul de
dang de'i 'khoradag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyas na kun tu 'bab par ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'brang+ge rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'ogyur ro// sangs
rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing ma g.yon/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dang po'o/// gzhan yang sangs rgyas [”]brjom ldan 'das rnams dgyes na/ chos kyi dbyis
thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cadodirab kyi dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ro dengabacas pa/ rgya mtsho dang/ ri dang/ nags tshal
thibs pa dang/ sems can gnas pa'i gnas tha dad pa kun dang bcas pa/ delta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spyi'i bu
ga gcig tu btsud de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa murathug par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyis shes par mi nus so//
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de snyad kyi 'jig rten khams sku'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig gis gzungasta/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bstsams shing gshegs sam
spyi bzhugs sam/ bzhengs sam/ gzims kyang rung// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs skad cig tsam yang skyo ba ma mnga' 'o// chad cing dub par mi 'gyur ro// mthu
dang stobs la yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'o// spyod lam rnam par 'gyur bsimapa' 'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dperan nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus
lhapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang skyo bamed dou0f8b/ dub pa med do// gnod pa med do// mad par mi 'gyur ro/ mi g.yo// mi 'byung/ mi 'jig go/ de bzhin du
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bsnams kyang/ de'i rgyus thugs skad cig tsam du'ang ma bde ba'i skunyams mo/
cas/'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo chachen po'i ste bas sangs rgyas kyi se da pa rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sangs bcom ldan 'das rnamA
gshegs stabs gcig tu bzhud pas sangs kyi zhi ba rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'da' zhing thugs bskyed pa gcig
gas bsal pa tha dad pa'i rim pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sted 'byung bar mdzad do// de lta bur gshegs pas bskal pa
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi julaganetu phra ba stod du gshegs shing/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyud ji sud pa'i bskal par bzhud di/ 'jig rten gyi khams thamA
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'jig rten kyi khams tsam du 'khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i 'khor yug chen po'i sde rje'i 'dring/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam pa brjod dumed pa'i yang

brjod du med ba la bsgros pa snyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyang de la bsgros pa de snyad ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu ka rgyud de/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu lta ba bzhin du sku'i ba spu'i khung bu thamA
cad du btsud de/ ba spu'i khung bu'ang soms can thamasacad snyad du gyur la/ de dge thams cad bsnamos te/ de skad kyi ba 'e khu bur chu+o bzhin du bshams te/ thugs bskyad po de lta bu s de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rgyu/
zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bgrangs pa sngon gyi mthar gtogs pa nas bzung sta/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par de bzhin du gshegs pas bskal pa thamasacod
zad par gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa la brtson pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// sku nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro// thugs rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin nyams par
mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
chos gsum pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod snyems gcig bzhes nas bskal pa brjod du med par skyil mo krung gatrig bcas pas nyin mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyi
mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtogs pa'i bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang sku mi g.yo zhing bde ba'i dam pa la spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pas rnam par spyod kyang/ sems can 'ga' tsam la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lasu rgyunaM 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yodra
tsawasu bkod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gcig gi lus kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yeng brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyadatsam du che ba
de lta bur gyur la/ sems can gcig gi lus kyi tshad rim pa de tsam gyi lus su sems can thams cad kyang gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cadra kyi lcad ji tsam yod pa de tsam du gyur to/ sems can gcig ltar lci ba bzhin du sems can thams cad re ra'i lcod kyang de tsamar gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegrwa
pa'i phyag ser gyi rtse mo gcig la byam mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par basnams te phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gis ji ltar ba stsams pa de bzhin du phyag sor thams cad kyi rtse mo la'ang
datsam re re bsnams kyang/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku mnyel po lam/ thugs dub par mi 'gyur te/ thugs bskyod pa'i cha shas shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du'ang sdug bsngal
mi bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug po dang/ phyogs kyi dra ba'i rnam pa la 'jug pa re re dang de lta bu la 'jug pa/
nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dbyings kyis klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa/ sku'i rtsa mor che shas kyis gzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad de zhing
yang sku'i rtse mo'i che shas kyis gzhal te/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis kun tu khyab pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sku'i rtse mo'i che shas kyi tshod kyis nam mkha'i dbyings la
'jug pa thams cad duzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam 'di'i tshul dang skyil mo krung gcig tu bzhugs pa'i spyod pas sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal
pa zad par mdzad de/ bskal ba 'da' bar mdzacing bskal pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal
mtshan gyi chos bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig la dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i ang brjod dus ma'i tshul shin tuphru kha snyed byin gyis/
brlabs te/ dbu re re la lcag sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod rumad pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sud byin gyis brlabs nas// de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/
sgra skad kyi gsung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tuphru ba snyad re re brjod d/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad
gi bar mdzad tsang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ sgra skad kyi gsung re res kyang mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhingab rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba med bshad la/
ma de sde re re la'ang chos bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yid brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa gcig las kyang/
chos kyi tshig dang/ yi go sangs rgyas kyi zhingebarjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad brjod par 'gyur la/ chos bstan pa gcig la ji ltar de bzhin du chos bstan

kha thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod de/ de ltar brjod pas bskal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdulashin tu phra bsnyed du rab tu bstan
la bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod dumad pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba spyod zad par gyur kyang/ da dung gzhan yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du brgyud cing rab tu ston pa'i tshul gyi rnam grangs 'dis bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba sed du rab tu bstan la/
rnam grangs 'di 'dra bas bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdulashin tu phra ba skyed zad la/ sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi spyod pa skyed kyi bskal pa 'das par gyur
te phyi ma'i mtha'i mu thug pa'i bskal pa zad cinge 'das par byas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa chos thams cad snang ba'i 'khor lo paskor ba dang/ chos
thams ca da rab tu shes par bstan cing lung bstan pa dang/ the tsam thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i tshes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ tshes thams cad/
snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad brjod pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor chen pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i ya shas kyi sgron me chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ tha dad
tshe pa yang dag par mkhyen pa dang/ mi ra jigs pa chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad de// sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig ga phyin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du ches
kyi 'khor lo'i sprin chen po dpa thams cad la dpe med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyengs ma lus pa thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa
ska'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gzhal ba ma lus pa thams cad chags pa med par rnam par dbye bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa
rgyudasid de snyed du thugs kyi skad cig re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i murathug pa'i bskal par sprul pa mdzad cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku thams cad las de bzhin gshegs
0dpa'i sku re re la'ang desnyad de snyad kyi dbu mnga' bar gyur la/ gzhung de bzhin du sku re re la'ang de snyad de snyad kyi lugs mnga' bar gyur te/ lcags re re las kyang de snyed de snyad kyi/
dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyangs ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad pa byud la/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ sgra skad kyi gsung
de dag re res kyang de snyad de snyad kyi mdo sde bshad par gyural/ mdo sde de dag re re la'ang de snyad de snyad kyi chos bstan par rab tu gzhol ba mdzad de/ chos bstan pa de dag re re las
kyang de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod du med par gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge de dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyas ma lus pa thams cad dbyangs kyis rgyas par bkang sta
goms can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la dub pa mi mnga' ste nyams par mi 'gyur la/ thogs pa mi mnga' zhing dma' bar
mi 'gyur te/ de lta cu'i tshes kyi 'khor lo bskor yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che
chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos lnga pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dpal gyi bebus brgyan pa rdo rjechen pa ltar shin tu brtan
par glu ba ba mnga' ba dag ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du byonan bdud sde ga te can gyis sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud kyi sde gzugs sna tshogs can/
shin tum sdug pa// 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'adug pa rab tu sdang ba'i gzugs can/ 'jig rten thams cad shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/ rab tu skyi g.ya' ba skyed pa'i
gzugs can/ bdud shin tumi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ rab mchog par 'jiges pa 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig rten thams car
phung bar byed pa// de lta bu sha stag gis byang chub kyi shing drung dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad dung/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gang bar gzigs kyang byang chub kyi shing
drung na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshigs pa rnams la bsnyengs pa mi mnga'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga' 'o// ba spu gcig kyang g.yo ba med do// thugs kyi cha nas shin tu phru bo 'ga' tsam
gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa tha dad pa 'dzin pa mi mang sbyo/ shin tu brtson no// g.yo ba med de// mi bsgul to// 'gyur ba medra do//
rnam par rtog pa med do// shin tu zhi ba'o// bstangs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral la// sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu snga ngas so// sangs rgyas kyi sprodapa rgyun mi
bachad do// byams pa chen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// thugs rje chen po gnas kyis dbang po shin tu dbenapa'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// thugs sha
tukhan zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o// tshu rol gyi sa gnon la pas zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs dang ldan ba ste/ bdud thamasacad dang/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang
bdud kyi sgo thams cad shin tu bral gyis gnon to// shin tu snga 'geng ngo// de ltar zil gyi mnan te sa la gong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tsholal/ de dag la'ang bcom
ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrubaste/ bla na med pa yungadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'di
nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgya mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ga bshegs pa
med pa ni 'i yig rten gyi 'ams ma lus pa dadang de dag thams cad du sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyis rnam par dmigs bar kun tu khyab par 'byung// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chung du ni
ri rnams la thogs pa med do// rab la thogs pa med do// rin po che'i ri la thogs pa med do/// khor yug dang khor yug chen po la klogs pa med do/ lca'i khyim thogs
ba med do/ klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do// gnod sbyan gyi khyim la thogs pa med do// dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med d+mo/ lha ma yin gyi khyim la thog/
ba med de// nam mkha' lding gi khyami la thogs pa med do// mi 'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med de// lto 'phye chen partsom la thogs pa med do// mi dang mim yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa
mad do// gal te brgya la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yong pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang na ca co 'dres par gyur kyang/ de la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung na 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' zhig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par dmag
ba la lhangang lham me lhan na ste/ go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyang rlag par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod
pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi tshes bdun pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shugs na chegs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i ango
lho brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs pa'o// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyan gcig tu gyur pa'o/ rtog pa med cing rnam par
bas dang stangashin tu gsal ba'o// bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o// chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// nang na gnas pa ma yin pa'o// phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o/
rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o// rang bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o// yongs su dag pa'o/ dmigs ba dang yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o//
chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug bgo/
chos kyi dbyinges kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o// 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang tshad mad pa drang bral ba'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gagaM
pa'o// tshig gi lam gyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul la// mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o// yidirAshes sngon du 'gro ba'o// stobs
cu'i rgyan du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o// thabs mkhas pas byung ba'o// chos sna tshogs dang/ chos du ma dang/ chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa
dang mi 'gal ba'o// dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad chos gzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga'i parol tu phyin pa b.res pa'o// chos/
thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o// chos kyi tshul thams cad la dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang//
phyogs kyi dri ba dang/ rgyud 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi ga ra la nyams pa med pa'i lashes kyis rab tu gzigs M pa/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi
mthar thug pa/ zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa/ thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang/ shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol pa yang dag pa'i 'tha' mi
zad pas klas pa/ chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhug pa/ dus gsum thams cad du bsgribs pa med par 'byung la/ sems can thams cad kyi dus
gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po' stobs sangs rgyas kyi sred pa'i
tshe rgyal mtshan gyi tshes brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni skye mi mnga' ba ste/ rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yulo tshad
bawa med pa'i sku'o/ mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su grub pa 'i snya'o// 'a jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o/ khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o/ brten
pa'i skas rnam par dmigs pa'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis sku'i rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa'o/ bden pa med pa dang ba rdzun pa'i sku mnyam pa de
kyis yongs su dag pa'o// chos kyi sku bzhud pa dang phyon pa med pa'i sku'o// 'dus ma byas bas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o// mtshan kyin med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang
bzhin no/ yul na mi gnas pa dang phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o// ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang rnam par 'phrul
pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no// lus thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dramigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// ye shes kun
tu snang ba'i stong po can no// skya yongs kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o// chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sku'o// khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par
'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku 'i rang bzhin no/ mi g.yo ma degs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o// yod pa'i ng ma yon med pa'i ng ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin par rab tu
@#// dpa'isku'o// sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sku'o// 'gags pa yang ma yin ma 'gags pa yang ma yin pas 'dul ba ston/
[D! ]pa'i sku'o// yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par byung bas shin tu ba phags pa'i sku'o// chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sku'o//
rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgrubs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o// thogs pa'i mnga' bas chos thams cadra thugs su chud pa'i sku'o// thams cad kyi rjes su song pa'i chos
kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o// phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas yerashes thams
cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku sta/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal
mtshan gyi chos dgu pa/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yengashes mnyam pa med dang mnyam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa ste/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o// mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa
pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o// tha dad pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
thams cad kyis bzung ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sed pa'i tshul tham cad thugs su chud pa'o/ smo na lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog po'o//
spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o// spyod pa'i stobs la thub par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba'o/
spyod pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa legs par spyad bs rgyud dma' ba med pa 'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med par spyad
pa'o ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o// lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma yin pa'o/ lam gyi yul med pa'o// lam thams
cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o/ yeshes dam pa'i stebs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o/ bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o// dge ba
dris pa dang ma dris pa la rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o// mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o// sku dang/ thugs dang//
gsung gi steng dag par spyod rnams la 'phrin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pas b.ros pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam/ ]
par spyod pas b.res bgo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rogs thams cad bskyod pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mdzad pa thams cad rab tu byung ba'o// thams cad
mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad med pa'i gnas rtsa ba med pa dang ldan pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thams cad kyis mthar thug par [”]mi 'gyur ba'o//
'jig rten gyi sems kyis spyod pa'i shes pa thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su
skyob pa'o// dus gsum yongs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir phra ba'i yiwe
thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par drug pa/ phyir ma lde ga pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du
sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku bgrangs ba thams cad thugs suchud pa'i shes kyi yo ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o/ yi ge sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang yi ge thams cad smos
ba0shing brjod pa mkhyen pas brjod dumad pa thugs su chud pa 'o/ kun tu bzang ba yerashes kyis dge ba'i chos rgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag pa 'o// dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du
sems can thams cad kyi lus dang skye mchedaji lta bar thugs skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khodadu chud par ston la mkhyenuba'o/ chos thams cad kyi don dngos
yongs su btang zhing ma gor bya bas sbug sa su chud pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul du gyur ba'o//
dus gsum thams cad la thugs skadacig gis chags pa med par mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lus bar
yul du gyur pa'o// 'jig pa med par 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'o/ thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o//
mtshams med cing thug pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du brjod
pa ma lus pa thams cad thugs cad cig gis mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o// sems can gyi rnam par thams cad la sa mtshams ma bcad pa'o// 'jig rtenagyi khams kyi rnam pa thams cad
@#// la mu med pa'o// dus gsum gyi rnam pa thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phying ba'i rnam pa thams cad la tshad med pa'o//
shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/ de dag thams cud lhag ma med par mngon par sangs rgyas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang/
rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba thams cad thugs su chud pa dang/ mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun 'chad pa med de/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi
mthu byung ba'i sas mtha'o dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yani/ thugs rje chen po'i sbyor bas ngus
thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bstan pa la spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yon te 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo rma chen
pa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bcu pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu po che chen po'i sdebs sangs rgyas
kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos rnams te/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyur ba'i sems can thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs thams cad kyis bsam
gyis mi khyab cing dpag tum nus pa dag gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs
rgyas pa/ com ldan 'das rnams ni de ga' ldan gyi tsho ji sra de par bzhugs nas 'pho ba la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zla ba bcus bltam pa bstan pa
la thogs pa mo mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'byung bar dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mngon par 'byung ba la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyishade drung du bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas thogs pa mi mnga' bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
thugs skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams ca da du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa
la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams n nges bzhin du 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

nidage ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin du dus la bab par bshad cing lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam+pani dus la bab pa'itshul bzhin du sangs rgyas/
kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa lungabastan pa la thogs pa mi/
ma' 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na skad cig gcig tu sems can thams cad kyis dri ba yongs su dris pa skad cig gcig gis lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ste/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tusems can
rnams myur du ngan song dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtho ngam thog tusems can rnams myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems
can rnams myur du mtho ris su skye ba yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du yid gnyes dang nem nur yang
la/ dag par bsal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur
te/ sems can mos pa yangs pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba las byang chub tusems m bskyed pa'i rnams kyang slan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu skyon med par ma 'das pa dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyi sems can rnams myur du skyon med pa 'da' pa'i rgyur rab tu 'dzin to//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu somasacan rnams myur du 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten la 'das pa'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsgrubs pa thams cad byang ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur
du snang ba 'thob cing mi 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa'i spobais pa rab tu rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma
thag du myur du 'byung ba'i tshes rnamaMs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu
@#// gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi sbyor bas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das rnams na sded pa rnam par dag pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pas kyang//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang dag par bsgrubs pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran
par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyad pa la spyad pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi
sku tshad med mumed pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa tshad
med mu med pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pas kyang/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa'o/
rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa sta/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang/ dus gsum
gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang/ sems du ma dang/ spyod pa dang/ g.yo ba'i rgyud thams cad ma lus par thugs gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang/ dus gsum gyi
sems can thams cad kyi las dang/ las kun nas blangs pa sna tshogs tsho ma chodagu rnam pa tha dad pas mngon par 'gro zhing nye bar sogs pa mang nyung dang/ rnam par smin pa blo dad pa ma lus
par thugs gcig gse thugs su chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can gyi rigs sna tshogs dang/ sems can gyi rigs du ma'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'dul
ba'i dus ji bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang/ rjes su bstan pa'i tshe'aphrul dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thugs su
[r/ ]@#/// chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang/ phyogs dra ba'i rgyud thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi sems can thams cad/
kyi sems kyi mtshan ma bzung ste/ sangs rgyas bstan pa dang/ skye ba dang/ rnam par dbye ba ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can
rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang/ mos pa jil ba dang/ 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med par skad cig tu sangs rgyas bstan pa dang/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba
ba dang byin gyi rlab sa pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par ba stan pa
ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba lta ba bzhin du khyu bar len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba ra gdams ngag dang/ rjes
su bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ de dang
der 'gro ba'i lam ma lus par thugs kyi skor cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa phyogs thams cad du
btang ba'i tshul ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi mes pa dang/ sems kyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin dusangs rgyas
kyi sku kha dog mumed pa/ dbyibs mtha' yas pa bstan pa ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra
bcomaM pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
thams cad la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams la 'di skad cig gcig tu tshes ston pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi
dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la mi2ma par bzhag kyang/ skad cig gis sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyang bdag med pa'i mtha' la gnas
par longs su sten te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ches kyi dbyangs ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum la mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs kyi skad cig gcig gi cha shas la'ang
mnyam par bzhag cing rnam par spyod de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyinges ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam kyis pa'i dra ba thams/
cad kyi sangs rgyus kyi zhing gi rgyud rnam pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang/ ma zad pa'i zhing gi mtha' la yang bzhugs shing rnam par spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
na chos kyi dbyinges ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku mu med pa la mnyam par bzhag kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmigaM
par dang dag par ston pa mdzod de// sangs rgyas bcom ljon 'dus rnams ni chos kyi debyings ma lus pa thams cad sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyis yongs su rgyas par rtag mkhas
par bzhag kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems 'byung ba'i mdzod sna tshogs la'ang mos pa dang yid la byed pa rdzolta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams n chos kyi dbyings malus pa thams cad kyis chos thamasaM cad kyareng bzhin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mur thug pa la bzhugs pa'i ng yongs su
mi gtong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten pa la rtag tumanyam par bzhag kyang/ thugs skad cige
gcig gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa'i ng rab tu ston to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las/
'das pa 'khyam klas pa la rtag tshumanyam par bzhag kyang/ thugs skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas mu mad pa bstan pa rnam par dgod pa'i tshul mumed/
pas sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyun mi gcod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du bsgribs pa med par rtag tumanyam par bzhug kyang/
thugs skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rtogs par thugs su chud cing/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes par
bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sengasargyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis
mi khyab pa rnams po// ku rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar ba rnams te/ bcugang zhe na/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas

skya ba brjod du med pa'i ya nga brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi 'khor la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor ba yongs su bstan
pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ rdul shin tuphro ba gcigo la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gabu lab brjod du med pa'i yeng brjod dumed pa yod+ma su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang//
rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la zhing brjod du med pa'i yeng brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par zer pa dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ rdul shin tuphra ba gcig la 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i zhing gi rgyud yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par
thar pa dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par
thar pa dang/ rdul shin tu phra bgacig la 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la
'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su bstanapa'i rnam par thar pa ste kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
blo rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'o// shin turgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u sumacu dgu pa'o/
kham po druganu rtsa bdun pa/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos mtshan rgya mtsho brjod pa'i don du/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i/
sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu lami chen po'i mtshan chos kyi rgyan rin po che sna tshogs sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'idabu de ni 'khor kun nas 'od zer gyi dra bas/
shin tu 'phro ba'i spunarab tu'abyung zhing rgyas par 'gang bste/ de la mi chen po'i metshan rin po che dang po dbu'i dbu mtshams na rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal po las 'jig rten lums
thams cad du snang ba bkye bas/ dpal gyis yongs su rgyas pashing yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngone rnam par bkye ba yongs su 'khyil ba'i klong gi dbyings
kyis phyogs thams cad 'od kyis rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dbu la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor glog gi 'phreng ba lta bur 'byung bas/ phyogs mtshams
thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub tu bzhugs pa ston cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nam mkha'i sprin kun tu 'adal bas chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs mdzad spu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i dbyibs las gsar gyi kha dog bzang por 'od zer 'bar bar 'jig rten gyi khams su 'byung ba'i 'od kyis/
chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gsal ba'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegrwa
pa'i dbu la rin po che'i bod kyi glong g.yas phyogs su yongs su 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang
ye shes kyi sgron ma snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sngon rnam par 'dal ba byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gsar yid du 'ong pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba rab tu 'bar bas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang bar bstan pa'i 'od kyi na cis bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
zla mtshan ted lta bu'i dbu// rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od chags pas/ phyogs thams thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pas/ sangs rgyas te sngon gyi dka' thub dang/ dpal gyis
dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che b+hADUr+ya'i 'od zer dang/ me tog gi mdog gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bar rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngone nor bu'i rin po che'i rgyal po'i
ye shes las rnam pa de lta bur byung ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchin dang rin po che'i 'od zer/
g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'phro bas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyi 'od de bzhinagshegs pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du rin pa che bod tshad med par de pazhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i sngonaces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ sangs rgyus kyi dbu de la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rnam par 'phrul pas/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtshos bkye ba'i 'od dang 'od zer dri ma med pa rab tu 'phros pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa rgya mtsho rnam
par snang bor 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho shin tuyangs pas tshes kyi dbyings kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ci
sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i rgyal po sems kyi rgyal pa dang/ in+danI la las 'od bkye ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i 'jig rten gyi
khams dang/ chos kyi debyings thams cad du snang ba'i byang chub sems dpar 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i sngon/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu sgog pas// 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dung ro 'byin cing/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho dang/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'byin pa'i sprineshin tu yangs pa'i 'od/
ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyal bo bzhurA'i 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i dra ba/
mngon par 'phags pa las chos kyi lus dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang/ phyogs rgya mtshor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang dag par ston
cing sangs rgyas kyi stobs chos kyi dbyinges la mngon du gyur pa rab tuston par bzhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chod med mu med par yang
dag par 'phags shing yongs su dag la dri ma med pa yongs su mnan te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kun tu snang ba'i rang bzhin rab tu bskye ba'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sngon ces bya ba mnga' ba
dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi mtshan rin po che las 'od rab tu bkye bas/ zhing thams cad kun nas yog
cing bsgribs pa med de/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gsung rin pa che'i me togashame tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rab tubaskye bas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho chen po rab tu sbyar ba las/
0/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi snying bo dang/ snang ba can gyi smin langs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bzhurma dang/ in+d+ra nA
dang/ rdo rje mang po las nor bu rin po che rnam par bton te/ rab tu bkram pa'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa/ rin po che baiDUrla'i 'od kun tu 'byung ba las sgra skad rgya mtsho
thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rnam par ston pa'i chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kun tu 'gyed pa'i sprin rab tusnang ba zhes bya ba mngar ba dang
sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs ba'i mtshan rin po che'i bod g.yas phyogs su 'phro ba'i me tog rin po che'i lhab lhub kyis brgyan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skye
de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sngon mngon par 'thon pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos rnam par dag ste/ bskol pa thams cad du na
par thar pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sems kyi rgyal po'i 'od ze ra dam
rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyan dumtshan rnam par bkod ba las 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin la snang ba shin tu 'byung zhing ye shes kyi sku dang/ chos kyi
sus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su khyab pa'i sngon dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi sngon ces bya ba mnga'
ba dang de bzhin grashegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje gzhom tog dang ldan pa'i brturlu kun dusnang bas/ chos kyi dbyinges thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur to/ rnam par
snang bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas par 'gengs shing/ 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo'i 'od kyi rgyan thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khebs

par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhes rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ nga res chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa'i mtshan rgya mtshes thams cad du brgyan pa'i spro snang ba zhes phyu ba mnga' ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngul de bzhin gshegs pa'i metshan chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i gzhi gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi rgyan dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyun tshad med pa thugs skad
cig gis yang dag par ston cing/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gengs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi da de 'dzin rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rnam
par gzigs pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pad+mo'i gzhi dang/ rgyan gyis ma rtog ri rab rgya mtsho'i 'od zer rin
che'i gzhi sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las byung ba dang/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul ba rgya mtsho ma zad pa'i 'od kun tu snang ba'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu 2
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dpal rin po che drim med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge 'akhri dang/ rgyun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzug/

bar n khong na bsrel cing rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i gzhi rgya mtshodang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos khyu mchog gi methu phyung ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis ni rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sprin zlos bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gi/ sha gas pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pe cha ma'i rin po che'i ma rtog dang/ gser
gyi pad+mo las chos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin dang/ rin po che'i rgyal pa sgron ma ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rnam par dag pasasnang ba'i rgyan bstan pas chos kyi dbyings tham
cad du dmigs shing rnam par bkyo bas tha ma dad cing sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i rin po che'i sngon dang rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i ri 'od zer stag pa 'i sngon gyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing/ chos rgyu
mtsho'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phrul pas snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa rin po che'i 'od zer sna chog
tshadamed pa dang ldan pa thams cad du rnam par dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis phyogs bcu thams ca du du shes rab kyi nyim shin tu gsal ba dang/
yashes kyi 'od kyi chos rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par dag pa'+rin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
rin po che'i 'phreng ba rnam par bkye ba dang/ rin po che'i me treg dang/ rin po che pe Dur+ya'i 'od du 'phro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od sang ge rnam par snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas/ chos kyi
dpyings thams cad du rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rdul gcig las songs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad du yang dag par 'phro bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid da dug
par ston cing de'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngon snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de kho nathugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid rin po che'i rgyan rnam par dag pas//de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snying po tshad med pa dang/ chos kyi
dbyings thams cad du snying ba'i 'od la 'jug pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchin rin po che baiDUrma'i me tog dang/ seng ge 'i zla ba 'od zer
0 rnam par snang ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa kun tu snyoms par dpal gyi sngon gyis chos kyi dbyengs dang/ nam mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zerasnang bas/zhing dang wAg na
ma nga par de bzhin grub bzhugapa'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i sngon ces bya pa mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rin po che thams

cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi dbyangs kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyis kun tu rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi swA na phyogs bcur bskye ba kun tu snang ba'i sa na ces spyad na pa tsha ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'du 'phro ba'i na bun gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang nus+sa bzhug wa/
chos kyi dbyings thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par ston cing rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad yongs su phyin pa/ nang
zhes bya bamanga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rgya mtshodang/ skyes pa de ru 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rin po che'i dra ba rab 'phel bsams kyis spyi
khams kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad sgrog pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyi sngon ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de brten gshegs pa 'i skye/
@#// bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yongs su dag pas/ zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu snang ba rnam par bkod pa'i phyir chos rgya mtsho'i skye bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas nas/

du 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi sna tshogs kun tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa mang po kun tu snang ba'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i debu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sngon chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bsgribs pa mimanga' ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
cad du bzhugs pa'i 'od rab tu snang pa'i spyin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan byang chub sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dang/ sems can rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul mang po chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snyang ba sangs rgyas kyi spyin kun tu mched pa dang/ rin po che'i sprin
gyi sgron ma'i spyan ces bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ye shes kun tu yangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ chos rgya mtsho lam tshad med pa dang/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang/ byang chub sems pa'i sde ba sems can gyi rgyud thams cad kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du sangs rgyas
kyi spyod yul gyis zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang/ spyod pa'i nga ros sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi kun gyi mthar thug cing thams cad mngon par
mkhyan pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi kun tu thug par 'byung ba'i sprin zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings dang/
nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rin po che snang ba'i sngon yid du 'ong ba snying po byang chub kyi gzugs bar n yongs su ston par mngon par 'pha gas pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yang dag par ston pa'i sngon kun tu bkyi bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshe thams cad du sprin gyi 'od du gnas pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor 'od kun tu snang ba tshad med pa ston pas byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa dang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang/ gzi chen pas chos kyi dbyis kyi gzhi kun tu snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po ltar 'od kun nas 'byung ba yongs su grub ste/ chos kyi dbyi
thams cad du 'od zer gyi srin dang/ 'od kyi rgyan phyogs thams cad snang bas rnam par snang bar byung zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs shin
tu 'phel ba'i mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa'i sngon gyis phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dri ba dang/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par khyab pa'i byang nurakyi
sams rin po che'i 'od zer gyi na ces bya ba mnga' ba dung de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor dbu'i gtsug nas mtho ba/ rim gyis mngon par
'phags shing 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar dang/ rin po che'i tshon gyis kha dog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od dang ldan par gyur pa/ gser gyi thig le dri ma med pa'i mig 'phrul gyis
kun nas shin tu brgyad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par khyab
cing zhing gyi dkyil 'khorasnang bar gyur pas/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su gyur pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu snang pa'i de bzhin gsheg
pa'i gtsug tor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rgyan du gyur cing/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/
sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu la de bzhin gshegs pa 'i mtshan/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'od rab tu snang pa/ rin po che thams cad du mdog ltar snang ba/ nyi ma dang zla ba/
ltar snang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas phyogs bcur 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa/ kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer 'byung ba bod kun tu snang ba/ dpal kun tu rgyus pa'i sangs/
rgyas kyi sku rab tu babar ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i me togashan tu rgyas shing/ rin po che'i sprin chen po shin tu'agyed pa phyogs kyi 'khor thams cad du rnam par snang zhing/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi sgra chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu 'phags pa'i mar ma rab tu snang bas/ na po che'i rgyal po'i me tog kun tu rgyas shang
chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ mtshan rin po che sna tshogs sems can gyi khams su
chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pas grub pa/ 'od 'phro ba'i sngon rin pa tshodangul gyi mdog tu kun ston pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i shangs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su dag pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi bod dang mdog dang/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur pa de
bzhin du thugs su chud pa/ rin po che'i ma tog gi sngon gyis kun tu rgyas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ sems
can gyi 'jig rten thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sngon ces bya ba mnga'a'o// sangs rgyas kyi lcags yangs pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams/
du cad lcags yangs pa'i sngon gyis kun tu khyab pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su grub pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gzhi las 'od 'phros pas chos kyi
dbyings thams cad rnam par snang bar mdzad pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems kyi gzugs bar n dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham
cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi rkyen thams cad shin tu ston pa'i gsung dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi lcags yanges pa'i sgo rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog gis rab tu brgyan
pa 'od zer rgya mtsho bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab tu snang ba/ bzhad mo 'dzum pas phyogs bcur rab tu bskye zhing 'gro ba thams cad shin tu dang ste/ rin pa che'i 'od 'phro' sa rab tu
brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sna tshegs rnam par dag par rab tu brjod cing/ shin tu rgya che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi nga ro 'byin pa bskal pa tshod
med par sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sgro 'byin pa// chos kyi dbyings gnas pa thams cad du nga ro yangs pa 'byin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dbyangs shin tu sgrog cing//
snang ba yang dag par ston pa'i dbyangs kyi sngon ces bya ba mnga' 'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyi 'og gi drung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs thams cad ltar
snang zhing mdzod sa yongs su 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu/ rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin lta bu/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs kun nas btang ba'i
dbyangs dang ldan po sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sbyabs can lcags kyi mtshan nyid rangs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul gyi mtshon chede med pa'i rang bzhin du/ sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyi rtse mo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchen rin
po che gsar gyi 'od 'phro bas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i debyings thams cad du snang zhing yid du 'ong pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po'i dbyangs kyi yan lag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du slog
cing gsung snyan pa'i ro myong bas/ sems can go bar mdzad cing bsal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par mnyan du yod par dbyangs kyi yan lag gi smA yang dge bar ston pa'i spyin sems can thams cade
la yid du 'ong ba'i chos su snang bas chos kyi dbyings rnam pa/ rasnang ba'i snga nu skyes bya ba mda' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyi rtse mo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchan zhing chadamed pa
grubya yongs su dag pan bzhugs pa'i gsung rin po che'i rgyal pos kun nas brgyan cing sna tshogs su gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi klong du bsngags//
pa rab tu 'jug pa rnam par phye ba gzhan dang gzhan du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i sngonegyis chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kununas yo ga par sangs rgyas kyi gsung la byang chub sems dpa' 'dzad cing/ zhing thams cad du rin pa che'i rgyal po sgo kun nas ston pas chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i
spri ne ces bya ba mnga' 'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi do kan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan in+danAl sna tshogs bama'i dbyibs kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi khongs su gtogs
ba'i byang chub sams dpa'i sprin yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ phyogs thams cad durin po che'i 'od 'phro zhing dri ma med pa byung bas/ rnam par snang ba'i sras kyi sgron
ma'i sngone gyi khongs su byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas 'dus par snang bas/ zhing rgya mtsho'i mong du bya ba thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rab tu gnas shing chos
kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid yang dag par ston pa'i son ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g.yas kyi 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs
dpe mtshan 'od rin pa che'i mtshan gyi rgyan gyis chos kyidabyings yangs pa/ 'od zer snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor le sna tshogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshoms mche pa rin po che rnam pa thamu
cad ngumadzes par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'od gsal bas 'od kyi dra ba kun tu bkye ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sems can du ga tog pa thams
cad la bkrashas dang/ 'khor lo rnam pa kun tu mdzes pas rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' 'o/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i tshems mche ba g.yas pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rjesgos kyi 'od 'phro ba'i spo na kun tu snang ba'i 'od zer rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i snying po can chos kyi
dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis gleng ba rinapo che'i 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer re re'i khongs su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chud par ston
pa zhing thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi kun tu nar cing mchod pas 'od kyi srin rinapo che'i 'od du 'phro ba ri rab kyi snying po can zhes bya ba mngar 'o// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i tshems mche ba g.yon pa 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa'i mtshan khyed shin tu ston pas/ sos dang rin po che yid du 'ong ba'ame tog sna tshogs thams
cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang/ rin po che thams cad kyis 'od zer rnam par snang ba kun tu 'phro ba'i sgron ma dri ma med
pa'i sprin yang dag par bstan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu gsal bas rnam par snang zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang na sang ka'i khri pad+mo'i snying po/
nAn dri ma med pa la bzhugs pa'i mo nabyang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings su/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi ri rab kyi mar ma rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mda' 'o//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshoms mche ba g.yon pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od sna tshogs kun nas rnam par dag pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi rin po
chi'i rgyud kyi du ba'i 'khor lo dang/ rin po che'i me tog shin tusnyang ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs yongs su 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyingasasu gsungasgrog cing/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par mdzad cing nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyan thams pyad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spro ne blad miweshes pa kun tu
mched par 'gyed pas/ chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi chon du stsang ba'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbyings la gsung gi skye 'byin pa/ chos
[o/ ]kyi sgron ma'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i srin du snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshoms kyi mtshamA na de bzhin
mtshan gcig par me tog gi mtshan dang/ rgya mtsho so'i mtshan gyi swA na rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dul ba las rin pa mi'i 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu'agyed cing/ bzhad mo 'dzum
pas sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab par rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho khongs su chud pa'i sung pa can gyis sangs
rgyas kyi tshems kyi mtshams thams cad rgyas par gang bas/ skad cig tu 'od kyis rgyas par kun tu rgyu ba'i 'od zerasangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kun tu 'gyed pa'i srin
snang pa zhes bya ba mnga'a'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'iskyes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar dang pad+mo'i mdog dang 'od ltar snang ba/ chos kyi dbyi
thams cad du mdangs rab tu snang bas dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang mdangs kyis kun dukhyab par rnam par snang zhing/ gsar dang pad+moraM
mdog yongs su dag pas kun tu sbyangs pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi mdangs dang mdog tu snang ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mgur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan dung gi me gur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od lam me lam mer yongs su snang bas mdog shin tugasal zhing/ gzhi thams cad rin po che'i rgyal
pos rnam par snang bar byas pas/ phyogs thams cad du rnam par gsal ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'i sprod ces bya bamanga'
da bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrug pa g.yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang/ gser gyi kha dog rab tu 'phel bas pad+mo'i mdog rnam par snang ba
dang/ rin pa che'i 'od kyi dra ba rab tu snong ste/ kun tu gsal bar chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad cing/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khongs su chud pa'i sprin rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas
rab tu mang po thams cad snying por byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi gzhi dang ldan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan shin tu 'phags shing yongs su rgyus la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi 'od dang mdog yongs su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo rab tu snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings
snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po'i mchog tu kun du snang ba'i son ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g.yon pa la sangs rgyas kyi debu'i mdzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i
gzhi las/ rin po che'i 'od ze ra gyi dra ba sna tshogs shin tu bsgrubs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang pad+mo'i mdog ltar gsal zhing bgrang ba rab tu ba kye pas/ chos kyi dbyings dang rje/
rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od ston cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu rin po che'i sprin kyi 'od rab tu snang ba bkye bas/ dpal rapo tu 'bar
zhing chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa 'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrug pa g.yas pa'i lcan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mtshan ted rnam par phye ba
rin po che'i go cha 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar lta bu dpal thams cad kyis rgyas pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyisangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i 'od rnam par snang ba/
rin po che'i ma tog sos kyi 'od 'phro bas shing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par phye bas brgyan te/ kun tu snang ban+de spyin ces bya ba mngar 'o ngazhin gshegs pan+ti sku phrag pa
g.yon pa'i lcan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chen sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i phung po'i sprin chos kyi dbyings kun tu reb tum ched pas spyang chub 2 mas pa'i dge 'dun yangs su
khya ba cing [0f8b ]chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i rgyan du gyur par kun tu mched cing snang ba'i dbyinges kyi sprodrin ces bya ka mnga' ni/ sangs rgyus kyi glu ga ka3dang la gyi them de la 7 rdo
gshegs pa'i mtshan mtshan nyid rgya mtshos kun tu brgyan pas rab tu 'jam pa'i gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi mdog lta bur snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi
tshad du 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'khyil bas yongs su dag cing/ chos rgya mtsho gsung dbyangs dang ldan pa rin po che'i me togashin durgyas pas rnam par brgyan tu/ rin po
che'i 'od zer gyi mtshan gyi dbyings rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i dpal rgya mtsho kun gyi gzhung gi son ces bya la mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi ba'u'i g.yas phyogs 'dab chags
nad bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i 'khor le snang ba'i gzhi'i rkyen/ rin po che'i mgo 'phrul gyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin
gyi lcan dri ma med pas rab tusnyang zhing/ phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'od rnam par snang ba/ dbal gyi be'u dang mtshams sbyorab rab tu ston pa'i sde ne+es bya ba mnga' 'o//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i debal gyi be'u'i 'dab chags g.yon phyogs na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i cod pan la snang ba shin tu 'phags pa'i spyin ci wun drim med pas thams
nad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dag par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston cing chos rgya mtsho'i sid pa rab tu ston pas/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
thab gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu ston pa'i sngon ces bya ba mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i ga las phyogs kyi 'og rol gyi 'dab
