gang ye shes kheng du chud pa na gang/ sams bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang pa dbus med pa ni gang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtor ni
gang sdom pa na gang/ dbang ni gang/ rnam par 'phrul pan gang/ sems can la rnam par 'phrul pazhi gang/ zhing la rnam par 'phrul pan gang/ chos la rnam par[}]
00 'phrul pa ni gang/ lus la rnam par 'phrul pan gang/ smon lam la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang/ spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang// kye rgyal ba'asras byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang/ mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pan gang/ rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pan gang/ stobs la rnam par
'phrul pan gang/ rnam par rtse ban gang/ khyu mchog ba mthu byung ba ni gang/ stobs ni gang/ ma 'jigs pa ni gang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos n gang las ni gang/
lus n gang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las ni gang/ rang bzhin na gang/ ngag ni gang/ ngag yongs su dag pan gang/ longs su 'dzin pa ni gang gis shin tu gzung
zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gis ni nga ga ba las gang zhig 'brub par 'gyur/ sems ni gang/ sems bskyang ba ni gang/ sems kyis
rgyas par dgang ba ni gang/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang pon gling/ bsam pa ni gang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ni gang/ sbyor ba ni gang/ mos pa
na gang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su mos kha la 'jug pa ni gang/ sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ni gang/ bag chags ni gang/ nye bar len pan gang/ nan tan
kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ni seng/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'gal ba'i lam ni gang/ skyon med pa zhigang
byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa thob ba na seng/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'byung ba'i latshani gang/ skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa ni gang/ lam ni gong/ lam tshad mad pa ni gang/ lam
gyi tshogs ni gang/ lam bsgom pa ni gang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi lam gyi rgyan gang/ rkang pan gang/ lag pa na gang/ lta ni dang/ sAng po
na gang/ snying ni gang/ go chan gang/ mtshon cha ni gang/ mgo ni gang/ mogani gang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rna ba na gang/ snan gang lcen
gang / lus ni gang/ yade rnam par rgyaban gapa/'gro bani gang/ gnas pan gang/ stan la 'dug dran geng/ mal ni gang/ rnam par spyod pa'i gang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod lulan gang/ lta ba ni gang/ rnam par lta ba ni gang/ a par bsgyings pa na gong/ seng ge 'i nga ro na gang/ sbyin pa yongs su dag pa'i gang tshul khrim yongs su
dag pan geng/ bzod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang/ brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa zho gang/ bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ni gang/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pan gang/ byams pa yongs su dag pan gang/ sAng rje yongs su dag pan geng/ dga' ba yongs su dag pa gang/ ba tang snyoms yongs su
ngag pa ni gang/ don ni gang/ chos ni gang/ bsod nams kyi tshog san gang/ ye shes kyi tshigasan gang/ rig pa skyo ban gang/ kyi rgyal ba'i gras byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi chos yongasasu tshol ba na gang/ chos rab tu brjod pa na seng/ tshes kyi zhen tanani gang/ bdudan gang/ bdud kyi las ni gang/ bdud kyi las bzlog pa ni gang/ sangs rgyas
mthong bar bya ba ni gang/ sas rgyas kyi 'phrin lasan gang/ nga rgyal gyi las ni gang/ ya shes kyi lasan gang/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud
kyi byin gyi che bas ni gang/ sangs rgyas kyi phyon gyi rlabasanageng/ chos kyi byin gyi rlabs na gang/ dga' ldan n gnas pa'i lasan gang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho ston pa ni gang/
mngal na gnas par ston pa na gang shin tu phra ba'i rgyud ston pa ni gang/ ras+ya bani gang/ gad mo cher dgod pan gang/ gem pas rnam par gnon pa ni gang/
dkye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nub sa kun tu ston pa gang/ btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston bani gang/ mngon par 'byung ban gang/ dka' ba
spyod pa'i sbyor ba ni gang/ sAng bo byang chub tu 'gro ba gang/ snying bo byang chub la 'jug pa ni gang/ snying bo byang chub la 'dug pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
ni gang/ bdud 'dul ba ston pa na gang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub pa ni gang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba na gang/ chos kyi 'khor lo ba tu
Ta/ bskor ba' tshes dkar po'i rnam ban gang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po
bstan pa ni gang// de skad ces smas ba dang////byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa kha chen po kun tu bzang pos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu shes rab
la dam gas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad lasmras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dug ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ bcu
gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu mthun ba dang/ rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi rgyu mthun pa dang/ shin tu bsags pa'i phyire

dge ba rtsa ba'i sgromathun pa dang/ nan tan byiba'i khyo'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthun pa dang/ 'byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgromathun pa dang/ byang chub brtan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi rgyu mthun/
ba pa dang/ rgya chen po yang dag par bsags pa'i phyir spyod ba'i rgyamathun pa dang/ tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mthun pa dang/ sems rab tu dang ba'i/
phyir sas sa ma chod pa rgyu mthun pa dang/ pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cud dang rgyu mthun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ de dgo la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shesachen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dgage kye rgyal ba'i sras
'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te/ bcu gang zhen dru 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ma de gi bar 'du shes pa dang/ dge ba thams cad
la byang chub kyis ben du 'du shes pa dang/ sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi snod du 'du shes pa dang/ smon lam thams cad la smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang chos tha 6
cad la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang/ spyod pa thams cad la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang/ chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang/ tshig tu spyod pa/
thams cad la ngag gi lam med par 'du shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phar 'dushes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsasumed par 'du shes pa'o/
[k g]bya// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shesate/ de dag la gnas shange byang chub sems dpang rnams la 'du shesa rnam
par bzlog pa lamakhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag ge kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor pa ste/ bcu gang
zhen 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i don du spyod pa dang/ bslab pa thams cad nan tan du bya ba'i
kyang don du spyod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i don du spyod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang/ ya shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa
ba dang bsgom pa yos su bsgom pab don du spyod pa dang/ zhing brgyan pa'i don du spyod pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten bkur ba'i don du spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gsheg
pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i don du spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba sras bcu po de dgano/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po spyod pa blun med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di ngegan byang chub
[a]/ sams dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen tu/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes
gnyen dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ chos thams cad ston pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la
gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ stobs pa la rnam par gden ma za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ 'gro ba thams cad nas gyen du skyod pa'i bshes gnyen drang/ bskal pa
thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rang du gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug
cing 'bab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen// kye rgyal ba'i sras
bcu po 'di deganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya'ogam ste/
brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ chos thams cad la gzud par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus
rtsom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad shes par bya'o snyam ste// brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par
bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ soms can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcad ngo snyam ste/brtson
'grus rtsom pa dang/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ sems can thams cad la 'khrug pamed par bya'o snyam ste/ ngortson 'grus rtsom pa dang/
sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mnyes par bu'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o//kyi rgyal ba sras
bcu po de dganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grunas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di deg nabyang chubs mas dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa thob pa ste bcu gang
zhen 'di ltar bdagan byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa la na gyi/ da dung gzhan yang byang chub kyams la dgod do zhes de dbugs phyin pa rab tu 'thob phogs bdagan 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa thams
cad kyis rtsod du med pa la gzhol ba yin gyis/ da dung gzhan yang rtsod pa med par dga' ba la dang tu dged par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob po//bdag ni byas pas chos las 'phags
kyis da dung pha de'i yang phyis rab chos las gyen du bskyod de sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thub bo//bdaganyidage ba'i rtsa ba btsal ba la btson pa yin gyis/
da dung gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshel bar ban pa la rag tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'theb bkabadagan pha rol tu phyin pa 'i lam du zhugs pa yin gyis/ dadung gzhan yang pha rol tu
phyin pa'i lam du 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bda gnas nigs rgyas kyi rigs su skye pa yan gyis da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skyo ba la rab tu
dgod par bya'o zhis dbugs phyin pa 'thob ba//bdag na dengs bo med pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin gyis//da dung gzhan yang dus bomad pa nga tshos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes
dbugs phyin pa 'thob ba//bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma sbyong ba la brtson pa yin gyis/da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad m spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o
zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo//bdagags ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur gyis/da dung gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
rnayongs su rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzad mi zad par zhugs pa
yan gyis da dung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod ma zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
rgyu ni byang chub sems dba' mas kyi dbugs thun pa 'thob sta/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dang 'a rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin pa sman med pa
'theb par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste/cu gang zhe na/'di lta byang chub sems
dpa' rnams n sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do//gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongasasu smin par byed de//chos ston pas kyang sa su can gyi khams
yongs su smin par byed de//skal ba mnyamangs kyang gums can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// gnas med pas kyang masacan gyi khams yongs su sin nga ba byed de byang chub sems
dbabaspod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do//'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par bstan pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par/
00 byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs susman
par byed do//thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang tshul gyis 'jig rten du spyad pa sna tshogs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed de/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyisems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed de// kye rgyal
ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag naM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/ bcu gang zhen/'di ltar byang chub kyi sems m nyam pa'i tshul khrims dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis
longs su spang ba'i tshul khrims dang sems can thams cad la phan par dga' bas rnam par blta ba'i tshul khrims dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims
dang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims dang/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su
bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las phyin phyogs sum ltaba'i tshul khrims dang/ chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med tshul khrims dang/ dbang so/
sdom pa'i tshul khrims so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de ngagazhi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin/
zugshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin brlan med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag gi dkyirgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di ngagan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa
lta lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan ba'i byang chub sems dang ba rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan te zhes bya bar shes so// bdu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar stange thag pa nas byang chub kyi sa mas phun sum
tshogs pa ni byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyaring gi rgyud las lung bstan pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lam skyo ba/byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o// bskal pa thams cad duzhe
don pan/ byang chub sems pa 'a rnams kyi lung bstan ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cadra laman nganadu byed panaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par chos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pani/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sogasapashing sgrub pa
na byang chub sems dpa ba rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// sems can khoms cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rag tu dgod par brtson pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge kha'i
bzhi/ bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gtsag tu byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pan/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'i// sngon gyi byang chub kyi smon lam rjes su srung bani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa lta/ lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i bung bsams dpa' rnams zhi bdag cag lung bstan te zhes bya bar shes so// kyi rgyal ba'i
sras bcu po 'di gni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang/ spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/
yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang/ bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang/ smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang/ mos la tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang/ zhing gi/
rgyan la 'jug pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang/ skye ba bstan pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems
dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis nibedas pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag ge/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
@#// 'di degan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub pa la 'jug pa/
dang mumed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang/ chu med ba chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang/ chu med pa'idubyas kyi dkyil 'khoral 'jug pa dang mumed pa'i sems can 'al bo
la 'jug pa dang/ mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'khrul pa la 'dzul pa dang/ mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang/ mumed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'drag pa dang/ mu med pa'o stobs
dung ma 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang/ mu med ba'amye ngan las 'das ba yongs su bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa
sto'ajug pa de dag gis 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sas bcu po 'di dgan/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang sprod ba la 'jug paste/sems can gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa la 'jug ba de dag gsan/ byang chub mchas dpa' rnams thams can thams

cad kyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la rab tu 'jug go/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mitha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ bams can thacad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i sbyod pa la 'jug pa dang
sa sems can thams cad kyi de ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi ma dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ semA
can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi debang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ samA can thams cadra gyi mos pa sna tshog sakyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems
can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nges dong dus ma yin par yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod
pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa 'a rnagasems can gyi bsam
ba dang spyod pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sa bcu po 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa'o rnams kyi'i drag rten gyi kham la 'jug pa ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
khams rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang ('phroge rten gyi khrims rnams la rnam par dag par 'jug ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chung du 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams
rnams la chen por 'jug pa dang/ 'jige rten gyi khamasa rnams la rdul shan tu phramor tshud par 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rab tu phra bar 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams
(la yangs par 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la 'byungapar 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas dang bcas par 'jug pa dang/ 'jig
rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas med par 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/de dag gson khyang chub sam
'tsho/ dbang rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dgag kyi rgyal ba'i sa bcu po 'di dgazhi/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa ste/
de dag gas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa thams cad la ral tu 'jug go/ bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar 'das pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i bsal ba la 'jug pa dang/
dra ltar byung ba'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang/ gras yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang/ grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang/ grangs yod pa grangs med ba'i bskal pa la 'pha pa da
zla gras yod pa gras yod pa'i bskul ma la 'jug pa dang/ bskal ba thams cad la bskal pa gcig tu 'jug pa dang/ bskal pacha yane pa la bskal par 'jug pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad la
skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dgan/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams te/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' nam bskal pal
[z/ ]'jug par 'gyur ba dag ge kye rgyal ba sras bcu po 'di regan byang chub sems dbang rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/de dag gse byang chub sems dpa 'chams dus gsum
shinetuston to// dacu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus la 'das pa bstan pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa dang/ 'das pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang/ ma
'ongs pa'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang/ ma 'os pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mozad par bstan pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang/
da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa drang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la dus gsum skad cig tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/de dag gse byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus oMsum ston par 'gyurab dgag kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
po 'di dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum la 'jug bste/ bdu gang zhe na/'di ltar brdal 'jug pa dang/ tshig gra ga la 'jug pa dang/ mngon par brjod pa la 'jug pa dang/
gdags pa la 'jug pa dang/ du shes la 'jug pa dang/ legs par bsgrubs pa la 'jug pa dang/ spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ ma zed pa la 'jug pa dang/ zhi ba la 'jug pa dang/ dben pa la/
jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum la 'jug pa ste de dag gse byang chub sems dpa' rnam dus gsum la
'jug par 'gyur ba dag ga/ rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma skyo zhing/ yongs su spyade lugapa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/bcu gang
( zhen 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gyi bya bas ma skyo zhing/ yongs su sgyid lug pamed pa'iom bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas ma skyo zhing/
yongasu sgyid lug pa yod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ chos thams cad btsa' ba la mi skyo zhing/ yongs su spyod lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ chos thams cadumanyan pa la ma skyo zhing/ mis su
skyid lug pa med pa bsams bskyod pa dang/ chos thams cad bstan pa la ma skyo zhing yongs su skyid lug pa med pa sems bskyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongasasusane par bya ba dang gdul
smra bos mi skyo zhing/ bo su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub larab tu dgod par bya bas mi skyo zhing yongs su skyid lug pamang pa'isams

bskyod pa dang/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'jig rten gyi khams de der byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pasam skyo zhing yongs su skyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi

ma00 khams ma lus pa thams cad du rjes su skyod pas bskyo zhing yongs su skyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par bya bdung yang dag par lta ba la mi skye zhing/ yongs
su skyid lug pa med pa'i sems baspyod pa'o//kye rgyal ba'isras bcu bo de dgan/byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi skyo shing/ yongs susgyid lug pamed pa'i sems bskyod pa ste/dedag la gnas shing byang chu
soms dba' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ga shesachen po yongs su skyo bamed pa thon med pa 'thob par 'gyur bdag gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dgan/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dabyekha' ye shes te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar sems can kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang/ dbang po kun tu d bye ba'i ye shes dang/ las dang rnam par sman pa kun tu dbyekha'i la shes dang/

skye ba kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dabye ba'i la shes dang/ chos kyire byas kun tu phye ba'i ye shes dang/ sangs rgyas kun tu dbye ba'i bshes dang/ chos kun tu dabye ba'i ya
shasang/ dus gsum kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang/ tshig ga rgyud thams cad la ngagagalen kun tu dabyakha'i yaragisaso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dgan/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyikyenatu dbye
pa'i ye shes// de dag la gnas shangebyang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa' la shes chen po kun tu dabye babla med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dgago/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo
'di dganabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/ bcugang zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad m brjed par 'dzin pa'i phyir/thos pa'i gzus dang/ chos thams cad ji
lta ba bzhin du bcu 'byed pa'i phyir/ chos khang du tshud pa'i gzungs dang/ chos kyi'ang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i gzus dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
gyis mi khyab pa thob pa phyir/chos snang ba rab tu 'theb pa'i gzungs dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos mnganadu thos pa yongs su mi zad pa'i phyir ting nge

'dzan gyi gzung dang/ sa skad dang tha snyadabasam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i gzung dang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos

bsamasam khyab pa shin tu ston pa'i phyir/dus gsum gyi gzungs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shin tu ston pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshog su spobs pa'i gzung

( dang sangs rgyas byung ba brjod du med pa thams cad du rna ba'i dbang pos khyab par byed pa'i phur/thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mdzesnyas

pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir/sas rgyas kyichos thams cad kyi gabus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnamAkyi gzungs dang te/de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
sa rnams kyis brtson par bya ba dag ge kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di degazhi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba sta/ bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar mngon

bar byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas dang smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang las rnam par ne pa'i sangasas dang byin gyi rlobs kyisangs rgyas dang/ sprul ba 'isangs rgyas dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas dang/

sams kyisangs rgyas dang/ ting nge 'an gyi sangs rgyas dang/ rang bzhinecusangs rgyas dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba'i sangs rgyas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sa ngas
rgyus bstan brjes su rtogs par bya ba rnamagaso byed rgyal ba'i yus bcu po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po sems bskyod pa ste/bdu gang zhe na/'di ltar

soms la sad pa de 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyi'i byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o//sams bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phu'i snying
chen po dang ldan pa 'gas sems bskyed pa de natsi'i go ba yongs su gtong ba'i phyiregatang ba thams cad yongasasu gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba'o//sems bskyed pa de sangs rgyas chos thams cad la mdo
bar mos bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lade la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'o//sems bskyod pa den byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o//sems
bskyed pa de na skyo ba'askye mched thams cad du nyams pa ra ma 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu 'o//sems bskyed pa des ches dkar po thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu 'o//semA

bskyod pa de mig zhan gyi ngan du brjod pa dang/ ngan du smos pa'i ngegadang/ tshig bzod pa'i phyirari bo chen po 'debang po dam pa lta bu 'o//sems bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin pachen

pos smad pa'i phyi'i bde bar byed pa 'o//sams paskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la ma khams pasam dmigs pa'i phyire shes rab kyi phar 'o tu phyin pas rtogs par khongadu chud pa 'odogs kyi rgyal
ba'i sras bcu pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu ma/zang po'i sems bskyed pa ste/de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i dngashes khong du chud pas
mkhas pa 'thob par ba gyur ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dgan/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bskal

pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon lamana kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so///ma byon pa 'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad achod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam kun tu bzang po'ispyod pa'i chos so//de nas

tham cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la dgad pa kun tu bzang po' spyod pa 'tshes sa//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i smon laman kun tu bzang po'ang pa'i chos so//
bkal tu phyizhi ba Tham cod la 'jug pa'i son lam kun tu bzang po'i srid pa'i chos so//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon 'a ni kun tu bzang po srid
ba'i chos so//'ge rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon lamana kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so//sangs kyi zhing thams cad du skye ba gzung ba'i smon lam kun tu bzang pod ches/ ches

thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon laman kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham cad du bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon laman kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshes sogs kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i byed ra 'chos te/de dag gis smon cing mngon par
brtson par byas na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po 'i smon lam dang spyod pa longs su rdzogrwa par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// bam po bdun cu drug pa/
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di degani byang chub sems dba' rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam

par blta'o/bcu gang zhen/'di ltar sems can gyi khams mgonamed pa rnams lam bar blta ba'i snying rje chen po'i btu thob pa dang/ sems can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen bo
rab tu thob pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa bas dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang/ yun ring ponas gnyid kyis brgyal ba'i sems can gyi

khams la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang/ dge ba med pa 'i samasacan gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi pe cing pas grags pa'i sems

ts+tsa can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i sange rjechen po rab tu thob pa dang/ sud ba'i gang chen mtshor rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa 'asems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i sIng rje chen mo rab tu thob pa dang/

yun ring po nas ni thag sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang/ dge ba'i chos latshes pamed pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i seng+ge rje chen po rab tu thob/
pa dang/ sas rgyus kyi chos las shan tu 'khyams par gyur ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba'i snying rje chen po khag tu thob pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po

'di dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen ga gse byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams te bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su snyani ba'i bya bar

ma ragadul bar bya ba'i rkyen na byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to//sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par skyon zhu byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to//sems can thams cad la bde ba'i go
byad kyi brgyud pa'i rkyen na byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// sems can thams cad lam shes pa bsal ba'i skyen na byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to//sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa

bstsal ba'i skyonan byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyisams kyi rkyen to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'arkyenani byang chub

kyi sems kyi rkyen to//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po longs su bstan pa'i rkyemani byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi se shes la 'jug ci

khong du chud par bya ba'i skyen ni byang chub sems kyi skyon te//sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mibastengs pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'irkyen ni byang chub kyi samasakyi rkyen te/kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag byang chub semA

dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// skyen de dag gse byang chub kyi sa grwa yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dgag kye rgyal ba'i bas byang chub sems dpa' gang gso bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzog

pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'il shes mgo par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyi ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang bkur sta dang/ bsnyen bkur bya'o//de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la

tha thu@#// mi gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di rig bskyed par bya ste/nganu gang zhe na/'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang/

[! ]dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du na tan du bya ba'i sems dang/ yid ma ba byung ba'i sems dang/ nga sAm yang mkhyid pa'i sems dang/ gcig tunges pa 'isoms dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sams dang/ smon lam gcig ba'i sems dang/ ston pa'i sems dang/ spyod pa mtshungs par yongs surdzogs par bya pasags te kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag naM/dge ba'i shes
gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so// de sems bskyod pa pa chu bo 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe/longasasu dag pa bdu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhen/'di ltar chungam za ba'i phyir lhag

pa'ibasam pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sems can jalta bur 'dul ba bzhin dubastan ba 'phyi'i gzugs longs su dag pa dang/ sgra skad dang tha snyad bsam gyisam khyab pa la 'jug bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil
'khor yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bas bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir slebs pa yongs su dag pa dang/ ma shes pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir zhe
shes lo sa su dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbangarab tu thob par bya ba'i phyi'i skye ba yos su dag pa dang/ sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
ba/ ba lo ngas su zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang sgrib pa shes thams cad spangs pasa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyi'i rnam par smone pa le sa su dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam gos su dag pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'athog pas 'byung ba'i phyi'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/yongasasudag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/bcu gong zhen 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yo ngas su btang ba'i phyire rgyune ba'i thal tu phyin

pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'akhrige tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa 'i stebs kyis bsam pa ma 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa 'i pa

rol tu phyin pa dang/ chos ba thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ban 'grus kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ chos thams cad yang

dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi tha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir/'o shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ kun tu bzang bo'i smon lam yongasasu/

rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir/smon latsagyi kha rol tu mi la dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i bya'i rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ chos thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar/
bya ba'i/chos kyi ba 'a 'o tu phyin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i spos bcu po de dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
rnams de bzhin gshegs pa 'a la shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa

khang du chud par bya ba ste/bsu gang zhen/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad par shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi 'os bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug

ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ chos thams cad la gcig pa dang tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan
ba'i shes ba kheng du chud par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyisam lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis 'jug pa'i

shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyis 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis
'jug pa'i shes ba khadu chud par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad los su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtog par 'gyur ba'ishes

pa kheng dachud par bya ba dang/ 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byang pa bsangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gas byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud bar bya ba'o/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya bsta/ de dag la gnas shade byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches snang ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob ba dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
du smon lam yongs su rdzogs ba 'thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogos par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go/
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi deb tu rtogs pa ste/bcu gang zhen/'di ltar chos thams cad la tshul gcig tulkogs pa dang/ sa thams cad la
tshul tha dang par rtogs pa dang/ chos thams cad lamtshan nyid gcigetu rtogs pa dang/ sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa de shesasu rtogs ba dang/ sems can tham

cad kyi debang bomanyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang

sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang ma dege ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam dang/ rnam par rtse ba dang/ sprul pa dang/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad rtogs pa dang
ba u@#// de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs b.rum lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa byin gyi rlobs rtogs pa 'o kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
rtogs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas ba than med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i spos bcu po 'di
blo dgan/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/banu gang zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi
tshu shugs dang/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi tshes su 'jug pa'i stobs kyangeshugadang/ chos thams cad mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobu
kyangeshugs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos M thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa ma gtong ba' stobs kyi shugs dang dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi rgyal bo chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mas cad la zab par yid ches pas ma slong ba'i stob shugs dang/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems las mi ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shugs sogs kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dgon byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi deshugs te/de dag la gnas shing byang
chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu bla na med pa'i thob par 'gyur ba ngag ge/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu de 'direg byang chub sems dbang rnams kyi mnyam
ba nyide de bcu gang zhen/'di ltar sems can tham cad la mnyam ba 'di dang/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa de dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lamanyam pa nyid dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad
la mnyam pa nyid dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mnyam pa 'di dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mnyam pa 'di dang/ smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad

la mnyam ba 3de dang/ spyod pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyide dogs kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni byang chub semadapa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/de dag la gan
shange byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyidi bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di dag/byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyisas rgyas kyi chos gyi tshul gyi lam nas te/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad na tshang tsamamo//chos thams cad n stsam lta bu 'o//chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu 'o//chos thams
cad na brtan ba tsam mo//chos thams cad las dang bral ba'o//chos thams cad nam zed pa'i sbyor ba'o//chos thams cad na yang dag pa'i mtha' bkatshes thams cad namtshan ma med ba'o/ches thams cad
naden dam pa'o//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyang+giso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag/byang chub sems dpa' rnamA kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ste/de dag la gnas shing
byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul lam khas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyurang dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems

ts+tshi dpa' rnams kyi skyes bstan pa ste bcu gang zhin/'di ltar zab mo 'tshos bstan pa dang/ yas pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ sna tshogs kyi chos bstan pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstan pa

dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'chos bstan pa dang/de bzhinagshegs stobs mngon par bsgrub ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ dus gsum dpaldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i

ba chos bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tanadang legs par ba tu brjod pa'i chos bstan bdang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab ba thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin gshegs ny+tsa

cad la dmigs ba dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'o kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dgazhi byang chub sems dpa' mas kyi chos bstan pa dang de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnamA
kyi chos bstan pa chen po ban med pa ston par 'gyur bdag go/ dkyirgyalaba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung paste/btsugang nye/'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa

sa ]ba dang bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung pa'i chos bstan ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang/ dpe dang mthun par bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung

ba dang/ chos kyi tshul dang sgo tham cad yongs su gzung ba dang/ gzungs thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang/ the tshom thams cad yolasu ga rnyed pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang/

byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin zhin tu bstan pa khesgo rnams yongs su gzungs dang/ chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad

'os su gzung ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang/ rnam par rol pa dang/ byin gyi rlabs rnams yos su gzung ba'o/ rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag byang chub samasadapa' rnams kyi yong
su gzung brtse/de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su gzung ba drag med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bdu
bo 'di dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pas bcugang zhen/'di ltar chos thams cad la rnam par m brtags pa spobs pa dang/ chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i slobu ba dang/

chos thams cad la ma gnas pa'i spobs pa dang/ sa thamacad la stong pa nyid dusnang ba'i spobs pa dang/ chos thams cad la mun ba med pa'i spopA pa dpachos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs
pa dang/ chos thams cad la gzhan gyi drang gi 'jig pa'i spobs pa dang/ chos tham cad la tshig gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang/ chos thams cad la de ngen zhing bstan pa 'i sgras/
pa dang/ sems can gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa ja lta ba bzhamedu tsham par byed pa 'islobs pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slobs pa ste/de dag
lce la gnas shang byang klubasams dpaba rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur pa dag ge kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag byang chub
sama' dba' rnams kyi dbang so/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs susmin par byed cing 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang/ chos thams cad snang ba rab tu theb pa'i dbang dang/ dge ba'i

rtsa ba thams cad laspyod pa'i debang dang ye shes chen pa 'debang dang mi gzhas pa tshul khram kyi dbang dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu longasasu bsngo ba'i dbang dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dzau

sgyu cad las phyi rim ldog pa'i las kyi dbang dang/ 'dud thams cad shin tu pham par bya ba'i da shesakyi dbang dang/ gang du dga' bar 'gro ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa' ye shes kyi dbang dang/ sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub n 'dod pa mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bdu po deragazhi byang chub sam dpa' rnams kyi dbang pa de dag la gnas shing byang chub
[n/]sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i shesachen po'i dbang banamed pa 'thob ba'agyur bdag go/ kyi rgyal ba sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chubusems dpa' rnams kyis
gnas pa ste bdu gang zhe na/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang/ sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang/ bya ba thams cad la mi gnas
ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang/ skye ba'i skye mched thams cad lam gnas pa dang/ smon lam thams car la mi gnas pa dang/ stod pa thams cad la mi gnas pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad sa la gnas pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas pa'o//bya rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dar/'a rnams kyim gnas pa ste de dag la gnas shing byang
chub sems dpa' rnams mas lang dag par sbyar ba longs suTashes pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cang blun med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag
na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems manyam pa nyid de/banu gang zhe na/'di ltar bsod nams thams cad bsags pa la sems mnyam ba nyid dang/ smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba thams cad la//
khams mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can gyi res thams cad la sems manyam bde dang/ sems can gyi lasa rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos la 'jug pa thamU/
cad lasems mnyam pa nyid dang/ zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dag pa thams cad la semu mnyam pa nyid dang sems can mos pa la 'jug pa thamAcad la sems m
pa nyid dang/ spyod ba'i rnam par rtogs pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi stobru dngam snyas pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam ba nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la sems ma nyam pa nyade da kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnamA kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/de dag la gnas shing byung/
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs mnyam pa nyid rgya che zhadze sman med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/byang chub sem
ts+tsaM dang 'a rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa sta/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sems can gyi kham mas cad kyi mes pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i yi rashasa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog khang du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes man bar bsgrub pa dang/ phyogs kyi dri ba ga par dbye ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ga shesa mngono
bar bsgrub pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang/ stsal zhi'i rgyu ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ chos thams cad gcig pa dang/
tha dad pa bcom klas par rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i yi shesa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs//
pa' ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ 'du shes kyis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam pa'i 'du shes dang/ rlom sems khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs
ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ tshes kyi rgyud thams cad la 'byung ba gcig gi mthar thug par 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon
par bsgrub pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ byin gyi rlabs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes
mdo par bsgrub pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dus gsum du 'dus pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pa bod du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes
mngon par bsgrub pa'o// kye rgyal ba sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang
chub sems dar ba rnams chos gang la'ang mgo rmongs par ma 'gyur ba dag ge kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sem dpa' rnams kyi sprul
ba// ba ste banu gang zhen/ bad ltar sems can sprul pa dang/ lus sprul pa dang/ zhing sprul pa dang/ mchod pa sprul pa dang/ dbyangs
sngal pa dang/ spyod ba dang smon lam sprul ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba sprul pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa sbal pa dang//
chos bstan pa sngab pa dang/ byin gyi rlobs smral ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ de dag la
gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad sprul pa yongs su rdzogs pa thun med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
dgazhi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ cu gang zhen/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/
sems can gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ las kyi byon gyi rlabs dang/ spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs ngang smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ spyod yul gyi byin gyi
sa dang/ dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ yashes kyi byin gyi rlabs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
ba/ dpa' rnams kyi byon gyi rlabs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams can la dbang sgyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu dbugs phyin par rab tu rnyed pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyod de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyid pa cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes par bya'o
zhes dbug phyin ba chen po rab tu 'thob ba// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i de ma gro bla na med
ga bya'o// mchod pa dang bstan kur bla na med pa bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
de dag la mchod nas kyang/ gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar byung bar gyur pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba
de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang man ngag bstan par mdzad kyis/ gdams ngag dang man ngag de'ang bdag gis bsaMm pa thag pas se ra byas te/ mnyen la yang dug
parananatan du bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'igra sa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'disnyam dusams te/ bdag bskal pa
[Y ]pa rjod du med par khyang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas brtsem ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen porab tu
'thob go kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyam du sems te/ sngon bdag bla named ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/
'tshob ched ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'am/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa 'am/ 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'i ng
N+NaM rung ste/ ji snyed kyis 'jigs pa gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur/ ring du byas par gyur/ rnam par bcul bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu/
sakyang ma 'jigs par gyur to// mi dengang bar gyur to// skyi g.ya' ba med par gyur to// se kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// skyi g.ya' bar mi
'gyur ro// de bas na brtan zhing rnam par ga min la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang/ chu stegs can dang/ bas kyi rgol pa thams cad kyis ma thub par gyur to zhes dbugs phyin/
ma 0/ pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sres gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag byang chub sems dpa 'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o// rab tu dgod par bya'o// de dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os
pa'i rim gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gzugs lam chod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang
ba bya'o// de dag ga bstan pa 'ang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung ba bla na med pas yongs su gzung par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab
tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'ad ltar sems bskyad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya sbyang
par bya/ klubs par bya/ yongs su sbyang bar bya/ mnyam par bya/ bsgyur bar bya/ byin gyis brlabs par bya/ bskyod par bya/ snang bar bya/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas/
dgang bar bya zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// skye rgyal ba sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can
thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par bya'o// nem nur gcad par bya'o// bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// sems khong du chud par bya'o// nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par
bya'o ngan song sgo gcad par bya'o// bde ba'i las kyi sgo dbye bar bya'o// mun pa rnam par bsal bar bya'o// 'od kyis snang bar bya'o// bdud thams cad dang bdud
kyi las rnams rab tu ba/dul bar bya'o// bla na med pa'i bde ba chen pa 'thob pas 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya'o// rab tu bskyed par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po
rang tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni den yod pa ste/ ji tsaman de bzhin
rgyu ga 'gras pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta bar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong bani rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur bzhi rgyun chad par ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas u dum wa ra'i me tog lta bur bskal
'a pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyan pa'i ng rgyun ma 'chad par 'gyur te/ de ltar bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sems bskyed pa/ g.yo thams
cad longs su spangs pa// drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa skya'i rnam pa med pasaM 3sems kyi skad cage re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs zhi
pachen po rab tu 'thob bo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyadade/ gang ga tshe bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang
rgya ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
nas kyang/ 'gro ba thams cad re rer sangs rgyas skyob yongs su bstan par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga chen
po brdung bar bya'o// chos kyi sngon gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po spyin pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir song ba'i
nga ra chen pos rnam par spel ba'i smon lam chen pos chos kyi dbyas su gnas pa'i bskal par chos bstan par bya'o// 'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus la
bak+kha/ @#// dub pa med par 'gyur/ ngag dang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
byang chub sems dbang rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la mngon
bar 'tshang rgya ba bla na mar pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dang 'isangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnams
te bcu gang zhen/ 'dra ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa bad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o// 'jig rten gyi
[F ]khams bgrangs pa de dang de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o// 'jig rten gyi
khams bsrangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams yod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su
shes pa gang ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams
ba cad du sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di// sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa lnga pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa 'don/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa drug pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan/
yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa rnams kyi mams sbyor ba shes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bdun pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa lasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa shes pa 'din/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa brgyad pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba'i sasargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyingesakyis glas shing nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing rab tu shesaso// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu shes so// chos bstan pa rab tu shes so// sems can 'dul ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin du phyogs bdu kun gyi'ang rab tu shes
te 'di zhes ngs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dgu ba'o// kye rgyal ba sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu
shes so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shesaso// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rab tu shes so//
chos de dag la 'ang rnam par mi rtogs pas rab tu zhugs nas rnam pa tha dad par ston te/ chos de dag kyang gzud pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su 'dzung ngo//chos rnams rnam par brtag
tu med par yang shes la/ chos de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du'ang rab tu ston te// 'dan sas rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes chen po thun mong
pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo 'di deganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bya
chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang rim gror bya ba la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyong de sems
! can thams cad yongs su smin bar bya ba dang/ gdul ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// dge ba'i bshes ga rten thams cad dga' bar bya/
wa07 ba la gnasashing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi
gtang ba la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa la gnas shing/ byang nub sams
dang 'a byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas nigashing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod do// byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs pa'i
'tshang rgya ba la gnas shung/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodad// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas su bya ba
rnams te/ gnas de dag la gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod ngo/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag// byang chub
u@#/// sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skyed pa bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar sgrib pa'i las thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ sems brtan pa
bskyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya na sa 'das pa rnams kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang/ bdud
thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang/ lus dang srog thams cad la ma blta ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang mu stegs
can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du tshar gcad pa 'i phyir/ sams brtan pa bskyed pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs sutshim par bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa
( baspyod pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri rnga dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'phye chen po thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang/ chos zab mo rnam par bsgom
pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyod pa dang/ bsal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems
bas dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas mi skyo ba'i rgyud du bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisams bskyed pa brtan/
pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po brtan zhing blanamed pa 'thob pa ba'agyur ba dag go skye
rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa sams bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gces
mang la som nyi med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ soms can thams cad sbyin pas yongs su bsdu bar
bya'o tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rjedang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
kyis longs su bsdu bar bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar ma 'gyur snyam pa'i nemanur// yid gnyis med/ btsom mad de/ de na gnasam yin no//'di zhi zhe nur thams cad
gcod ba'i bskyed pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan gang ji snyed du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyes par bya ba dang/ sas rgyas thams cad machod nyung bstan bkur ba'i sams bskyed pas mnyes par bya'am
[Y ]pang de'ang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i rtsom zhu ra med/ yid gtis med/ the tshom med de/ dona gnas ma yazhino// 'di na nemanur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed
ba gnyis pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan gyis yo ngas/
su rgyas par dgang ngo snyam yang de la de de ltar m 'gyur snyam pa bzhia nur med/ yid gas med/ the tshom med de/ dani gnas ma yin te// 'din nam nur thams cad gcod
pa'i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa'i mur thug par mi skyo ba'i rgyud kyis
sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ soms can gyi khams gras med pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa// tshad med pa// gzhal du med pa/
kun tu mtha' las pa// mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa grangs dang pa gang ba las 'das pa// chos kyi dbyings kyis kas pa//
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad bla na med pa'i yongasasu smin par bya ba dang/ dran med pa'i rnam par gdul bas yongs su smin pa dang rnam par gdul bar bya'o
sAmana'ang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nyisaur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tsam med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sams bskyod
bskyed pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o shes nas de la nem nur med/ yide gnyis med pa dang/ the tsam mid par gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems
bskyod pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'isras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
snang bar 'gyur pas/ chos thams cad mngon du gyur par 'gyur ro snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa 'an la nur med/ yid gnyis med/ thecom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/
'danonem nur thams cad gcod pa'isams bskyod nga drug pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di snyam ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sam khong du chud
bya@#// par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ches su mos par bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar ma ba gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the
tsom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di nanamamur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyod pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chags pa med pa'i
chos kyi sgo thams cad chags pa thams cad ma demags pas rab tu shes shinge/ de la nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tsam med pas slanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung rung
mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid la gnas pa 'di'i nimanul thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos
thams cad 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rab tu spangs pa dang/ blang ba mad cing der ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su shes te/ de la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing nam ra
med yade gnyas med la// tha tsam med pa yin te/ 'dan nem nur thams cadra gcod pa sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o// byed rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a 'dasnyan
du sems te/ 'du shes kyi phyonatsalog thams cad rab tu slangs pa 'i sems skad cig gtsag gi ye shes gcig dang/ gnyis su ma dmigs pa'i bgrang ba thams cad dang bral ba/'dus ma
byas la shan tu gzhol ba/ brjod pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa/ spyod yul brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar ma 'gyur snyam pa'i ma nur med/ yi dgas med/ thi tshem med de/ de ni bsam yin no// 'di la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa b.ru pa ste/
kyi rgya'akhru ba'i sras bcu par dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tsam med cing yo da gnyis med la
som nyi med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cud la nem nur med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur pa rtog go
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di degani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyide re/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsam gyis
ma khyab pa yin/ smon lam thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa la bsam gyis ma khyab pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za zhing rtog mo med pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ kye rgyal
ba'isras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i tshes thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug la/smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan/
las kyang mi 'da' ba 'don bsam gyis mi khyab pa lnga pa'o//kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/mngal du 'gro ba dang/ skye ba dang/
gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nengan gnas pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang/ snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang//
rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan 'dus 'da' ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongs su ston cing/
snying rje chen po dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyi bar gyis yongs su rgyun ma gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa drug pa'o/kyi rgyal ba'i sras gnyan yang
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas par sems bskyed pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang byan gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par ston la/sems can yongs susbyin
par bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa bdun pa'i// kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug/
ma mtshan ma yod pa la mtshan ma med par 'jus/rtag pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston/ rtog pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston/dngos po med pa la dngos po yod par 'jug/dngos po yod pa la
dngos po med par 'jug/ mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya bamed par ston/mno par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston/chos thams cad brjod du med pa la/
brjod du yod par shes/chos thams cad brjod du yod pa la brjod du med par shes te/ 'dano bsam gyis ma khyab pa brgyang pa'o//kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
byang chub kyang sems dang mnyam pa rangashes la/sems kyang byang chub dang mnyam pa ra shes te/'gro ba thams cad kyang soms dang byang chub tu shes mod kyi/de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur
ba med/ 'du shes phun ca leg tu 'gyur ba med/ lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med/ 'di ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re zhing 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du ma byed/ zag pa zad pa yin yang dug ba'i rtsa ba zag pa zad par mi
byeng tshes thams cad zag pa med par yang shes/ zag pa zad par ye shes/ zag pa 'gag par yang shes shing/ sas rgyas kyi chos la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'jug ste/ 'jig
rten gyi chos la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis 'jig rten gyi ches la rnam par mi rtog/ 'jig rten gyi tshes kyis sangs rgyas kyi
chos la rnam par m rtog/ chos thams cad gzud pa mod pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbyingasasu 'dzud la/ chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnyis su mang par
ye shes pa 'din bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu pa'o// byed rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub samasadapa' mas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams de/ de dag la
gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa blanamed pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag gi// bam po bdun
cu rtsa bdun pa/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi
chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang/ skya ba'i skye mched thams cad la dgos de bshad pa la mkhas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul
dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin par 'jug pa
k+kha thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa lamakhas pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ rnam pa ra ljang bu la dgongs te ba shad pa la
mkhas pa dang/ chos thams cang chags pa med pa ba sgo'a mthar phyin pa la bsgribs pa mad ba'i tshul gyis dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa sta/ 'dazhu dgongs te bshad pa la
mkhas pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'asras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs re re dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re na'ang/ 'ag na gyi
khams 'grub pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa rgyun mi 'chad cing mtshams med pa shes pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad du phu ba dang/ yangs pa'i 'jug pas yongs su 'jug pa thams cad gzung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams skye ba nas bzung ste/ yongs sumya ngan las 'da' ba chen pa'i bar du gzung ba rgyus 'chad pa med pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis
yongs su gang bar 'jug cinge/ sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par phye bar mthong ba 'dinadagongs te shad pa la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad ma 'gyur ba'i tshul rgyas mya ngan las 'das bar shes kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i son lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs

du kyi brda ru so na lam phyir zlog par mi byed pa 'don dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes

la dge ba'atheshes gnyen la brten pa'i ng rang du ma slong/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i deg ba'i rtsa babasnga yang
dag par sdud tsa bskyed pa dang/ sbyong ba dang/ brtan par byed ba dang/ rnam pa gcig tu byed pa dang/ rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa dang/ gcig tu 'byung bar byed pa dang/ yongs su
grub pa gcig tu byed pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa rnams te/
de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ban med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras
bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'dzultar zhi thams cad du ya shes rnam par dbya ba la mkhas pa dang/
mtha sems can gyi skye mched la 'jug par ye shes rnam bar dbye ba lam pasapa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems drang po drug la 'jug bar ya shas rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ sams
can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin paman par 'du byed pa la 'jug par ye shes rnam
par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par yabashes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par yashes
rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par yeshes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ 'dzagi rtan gyi chos thams cad
la 'jug par ma shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'dzugs par yazhus rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa// kye rgyal/
ba'i sras bcu po de dag na/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ de dag la gnas niangepyang chub sems dpa' rnams
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yashes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa lngathob par 'gyur ba dag go kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'dod g ni/
ba/ @#/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shes pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
sems can thams cad kyi lus la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chos thamasacad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas mthong ba thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ bskal par
gnas par mkhas pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus kyi rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzanadang/ rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'grob thams cad khong du chud par bya bas snyoms pa'i ye shes kyis mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems kyi skar rug gcig gi nges shes kyis 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ chags pa ma pa'-i sems skad
ga ya shas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang drag par byang ba la rab tu gnas shing/ rgyun mi gcod pa'i skyen lam chen po'i ye shes ma bas pa la snyoms
par 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ de dag la gnas gzigs byang chub sems
mtha ]dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thums cad du snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ dkye rgyal ba'i sras pa po kar drag ni/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi reli po rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'an ltar ral gyis sems can dang/ ral gyis zhing dang/ ril gyis mtshan nyid ma mthun pa'i
'gro ba dang/ ril gyis bskal pa'i mi dang/ la gyis nus 'jig pa dang/ ral gyis sangs rgyas dang/ la gyis su tshogs mdzes par bsgrub pa rang/ ril
gyis de bzhin gshags pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa dang/ ral gyis chos thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan pa dang/ ral gyis rta patshani gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa
rnam pa tha dad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dol po ste/ de dag la gnas bang byang chub rtse pa sa da la ra rnal ma de badzAsbe
gshegs pa'i ya shes chen po ral po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dganaM/byang chub sems (panams kyi rnam par thar
pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyas par gang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
kha dog du ma dang/ la dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangesathams cud la sangs rgyas kyi 'ange gcig tu 'jug pa'i rnam
par thar pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad byin rlabs pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i 'adzag rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyus par
dgang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ bdag 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad du phyin par shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ 'dzagi rten gyi khams thams cad du sems kyi skyed cag
a gcig gis 'gro ba 'a rnams ra pa dang/ 'ag rten gyi khams gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad skyob yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus
gcig tu shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang/ sems kyi skad tsag gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par stsal pa dang/ rnam par rol pa dang mi 'bral ba yongs su bstan pa'i
rnam par thar pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams ra
de bzhazhe gshegs ba thams cad kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'arda dag na/ byang chub

mawa/ sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon gyi gnas rjesasu dran pas mngon nga rang bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa drang/ lha' rna ba sgrib
ba med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shaji shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ sems can pha rol dang/ gang zag pha rol gyi sems dang spyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yodres su shes
ba mno par bsgrub pa'i mkhas shishes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i mig thogs pa med nga sa rnam par pa blta bam klon rar bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes
pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tho lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas
shang shes pa' mngon par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis ma khyab par lus yongs su bstan pa mang+gen pa/ ra ba sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i
mngon par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par soms skad cig gis 'gro ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhaMs share shes pa'i mngon par shes
pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis ma khyab pa brgyan par byin gyis brlabs pa la mkhas shaji shes pa'i man par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rgyud brjod du med par
bab/ @#// sul pa yongs su bstan pa man bar bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par bdag bla na med nga
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar sems can gyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa la mkhas shing shes pa' mo/
