tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur par de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ bdagagadag pa'i rtsa ba 'dras dge ba'i
bshes gnyen rnams dud gcig cing mnyam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sumatshogs pa
gyur cig/ bdag gdage ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang yidi la bya ba gcig pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhen/
[S17} ]@#// rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur ga/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang yongs su dag pa gcos/
pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sumatshogs par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhe naM/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ bdag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba
'dasi dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang gcig tu rnam par sun u0f7cpa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par gyur ram 'gyur shon/ rnam pa gzhan de ma 'gyur bar
de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gany+tsen rnams dang gcig 'dimanyam par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs
par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogos par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhen/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ca2 se dge za' bshes gnyen rnams
dang tha mo dad pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma'agyur bar dre ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces bya ba'o// kya
rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de dag la goms shing byang chub sems dang 'a rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
dbasngo ba sman med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag na/ byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyi yi shes khong du chud pa ste/ bcu nga zhen/ 'di
ltar gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam par 'phrul pa' ye shes khong du chud pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang/ de bzhani saMshigs pa thams
kyi yingashes mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i yashes khong du chud pa dang/ dris pa thams cad kyi lha rtsom gcod pa' yashes khong du chud pa dang/ don shes pa la 'jug pa'i yashes khong
ru chud pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung la mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yid ches par 'jug pat+ta ya shes khong du chud pa dang/ sangs rgyas la
bskyed pa'i dag bcu pa chung yang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shes tshad med par 'gyur bar yi rgyas par byas shang/ chos dkar pe thoms cad yongs su rdzogs
bar byed pa'i yi shes khong du chud pa drang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i yashes khong du chud pa dang/ sams
kyi skad gi gcig gis sang sa rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par 'gro zhing gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sams skad cig gcig gi ye shes bod du chud pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i rgyan gya ye shes khong du chud pa'o kyirgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi ye shes khong du chud
pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yashes khong du chud pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyargyal
ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rnams de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la sams bskyed
ba rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs thams can du 'jug pa la sams bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing dang/
dus dang/ chos kyi dbyangos su 'jug pa la sams bskyod pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ chos thams cad nam mkha'adang mnyam par lta ba la sams bslad pa rgya che/
po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ byang chub sems da pa'i sbyin pa thams cad la rgya cher brtag pa la sems bskyod pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ rus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
thams cad yid la bya ba la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang/ las dang rnam par sun pa bsam gyis ma khyab par 'jug pa la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po/
mthang dang dbus med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi lha thams cad yod sa su dag par bya ba la sams bskyed ra rgya chen po mkhru'u ra nga dbus med pa dang/ 'khor gyi da kyil 'khor thams cad
'jug ba la soms brgyad pa rgya chen po mtha'adrang dbus med pa dang/ re pagasne gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings rnam pa blta ba la soms brgyad pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med/
pa'o kyi rgya la ba'i sras bcu bo de dgazhi/ byang chub sams rapa' rnams kyi sams bsgyur pa rgya chen po mahu'u dang dbus med pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
sams dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyis mtha' da lnga dbus medar thams cad kyi ye shes rgan po rgya mtsho lta bu bla na med pa 'thob par gyur ba dag go skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
'di regan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'ar ltar chos thams cad la bgrang bas sbyar gtor dang/ chos thams cad la rjes par gos
pa'i gtor dang/ chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang/ chos thams cad la dad pa yang dag par shes pas rab tu snang ba'i gtor dang/ chos thams cad la
brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa khong du chun pa'i gater dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ mo'aphrul thams cad la so sor rtog cing lta ba'agater
dang chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyidi ru mngon par bsgrub par mkhas pa'i gater dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang ma 'bral ba'i gter dang/ sgyu ma lta bu'i bskal pabasam
'a gyis mi khyab pa yongos su grub par 'jug pal mkhas pa'i gter dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dang 'a thams cad la dga' ba dang/ reb tu dga' ba dang/
mos pa chen po rab tu red pa'i gatrer ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag sgo/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi gter te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'/
[W ] rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshes kyi yang shos kyi gatrar bla na med pa 'thob pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba la brtson par byed pa dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i
smra/ sras bcu po 'di daganaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom paste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sathams cad lam 'khrug ma 'khrul ba'i rtsom pa dang/
sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam pa'i sdom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad labasaMm pa rlabs po che' sngom pa dang/ dbye ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la bsam
dpa ma 'dor ba'i sdom pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yar la bya ba thams can la yongs su ma rgya baTi sdom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' na brab 'i lam thams cad
rnam par bzlog pa 'a sngom pa dang/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sdom pa rung/ dge ba'i rtsa laMthas cad mthar phyin par bya ba'i sdomapa dang/ bdud thams cad rab tu
pham par bya ba'asdeme pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byaba'i sdom pa'o// kye rgyal ba'asras bcu po de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pas
de dag la gnas shing byung tshubasams dpa' rnams ye shes chen po' sdem pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur bdag go/ kye rgyal ba sras bcu po 'di dag na/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi dbang sdu/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar bskal pa brjod du med par tshu'i tshad ban gyis rlob nga sa tshal dbang pa dang/ tang nge 'dzin grangs med pa la nges par gas
par gzhog tsang/ yashes kyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan rnam par dbye ba du mas rab tu brgyan par byin gyis brlab
par ston pa'i tshul gyi yo byad la dbang ba dang/ dus ja lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byon gyis rlob pas las la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye bsto'ipA
@#// skye ba la da pang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sang sargyas kyis yongs su gang bar lta bas mos pa la dbang ba dang/ dus dang badre gang du 'dod
par mngon par 'tshang rgya bas son lam la 'bad pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ chos kyi sgo dang snas
mthu' dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston pas chos la dbang ba dang/ rdo bshazhe gshogs pa'i stobs bcudad mo bsnyengs pa skor tsagi skad phyag tu go bar yongs su ston pas
ye shes la dbang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag naM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sta/ de dag la gnas shaji byang chub sems dapa' rnams sas rgyas thams
cad kyi byang chub kyi mnga' sdeb rol tu phyin pa yishes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dgag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar sems can la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhing la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos la rnam par 'phrul
pa dang lus la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ smon lam la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ mngon par shes/
pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can la rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'ad ltar sems can thams cad sems can med pas sgrol ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang
sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par byin gyis brlab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can thams cad la dus la bab na chos ston pa rgyun ma gcod pa'i rnam par
'phrul pa dang/ samasacan gyi khams brams cad du sprul pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbubs gcig tu btsud kyang gtsud par mi 'gyur ba'i
rname par basprul pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad 'ge rtag rgyu bams su byin gyis brlabs te pha rol shes par byed pa dang/ yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang
sems can gyi khams thams cad du brgyu byan dang/ chongs pa dang/ 'dzage rtan gyi mgon po'i dbang yongs su ston pat+tA rnam par 'phrul pa dang sazhas tshan gyi khams thams cad
du nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ mtshan dang/ cho ga dang/ spyod lam yongs su ston pa'i snom par 'phrul pa dang//
ka sems can gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa thob pa yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du thums
tshad mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang/ mtshan dang/ dpa byad bzang po sba tshogs kyi rgyan yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kyi rgyalaba'i
sras bcu po de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can lo rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'dra deg ni/ byang chub sams drapa' rnams zhing
la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar nang thams cad shong gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa'o rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'ang thams cad sgra'i spubs gcig tu 'dzud pa'i rnam
par 'phrul pa dong/ 'di thams cadra ma zad pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhinge thams cad skyel mi krung gcig gis rgyas par dgongs pa'i lus gcig yongs su
ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhange thams cad rang gi lus su chud por yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhing thams cad rab tu bskyod kyang sems can 'dzugs
[4/ ]par ma 'gyur pa'i rnam par du phul pa dang/ zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par phye pa zhing gcig tu yongos su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhang gtsag gis rnam par phyi zhing thams
cad kyi rgyan rnam par phye bar yongs su ston pa dang/ zhange thams cad kyi de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor de la 'bor ru de bzhin gshags pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su khyab par
sems can thams cad la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrulapa dang nga tshab dang/ yangs pa dang/ rgyu ba dang/ thob pa dang/ sAl ni deng/ spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang/
gzhi mnyam pal 'dzug par yodras su gzhol pos phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par bla pa la 'jug par soms na ma lus pa thams cad la yongs su ston pa'o rnam por 'phrul pa ste/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lnga pa rnam pa pa g+ha/ kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi chos la rnam par 'phrul po ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'dra ltar chos thams cad chos gcig du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang/ chos gcig pu chos thams cad du
yang dag par gzhol bar byed kyang/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang ma 'gal bor rnam par dmigs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
pas sgrub par khong du chud par bya ba pha rol gyi ga bar bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos thams cad 'angashes dang bral bar sems can mang pos khong du chun
du par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu 'jugatsang tshul mtha' yas par ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ chos thams cad la brjod du med par
tshe 'jug mnge sgo brgya stod gi pharel gyi rgyud du bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos thams cad sgokun nas rgyu ba'i yi ge'i tshul la mkhas par rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos
thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig dang mo 'gal ba 'jug pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ra bstan pas/ bskal pa brjod du med cing mi srid pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos thams
cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa la sems can mang po gzud pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa drang/ chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
dang/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin cang mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sgyu ma'i dra ba rnam pa thu dud pa la 'jug pamed pas bskal pa mu med par mi zad par sems/
can la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshes la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po/
'dod ga na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu krang ba na/ 'di ltar [“ ]yus kun byams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob cang/ mos par
byed pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rang gi lus samasazin thams cad kyi lus kyi 'du shes su blon gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas shums cad kyi
sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur mos shaji 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgya sa ma lus pa thams cad kyi skur 'jug cade/ gzhan la yongs su sdo
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhing thams cad du nam mkhar byin gyis rlob pa'i rnamapar 'phrul pa dang/ dus gsum smrams cad chos kyi sku gcig gis yongs su rgyas par sems
can la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ lus gcig tu tange nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag cinge/ lus mtha' yas par rnam par ldang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang/ lus gcig gis
mngon par sangs rgyas shadi/ sems can snyed kyi lus su yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang sems tsa thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gis lus su ston pa'i rnam
par 'phrul pa rang/ sems can thams cad kyi lus chos kyi skur ston cing/ chos kyi sku sems can tshu lus su ni dar 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
byang chub sems dar 2 rnams kyi lus la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di degan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na lam
la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ gcu gar zhen/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rang ga so na lam du byan gyas ba pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams
'tshe cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi se na lam gyi sobs dwang mthu mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub par yongs su ston par rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can ji ltar son pa dang rang
ga bsam pa bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ bskal pa bgrangs pa mu med pa thams cad du smon lam
gyi rgyun mi gcod pa'i rnam ra ra 'phrul pa dang/ rnam par shes pa 'a lus las gyen du bskyod de/ ye shes kyi lus la'ang mi gnas pa'i smon lam la dbang sgyur bas lus thams cad yongs
su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rang gi lus tshad du gyur pas pha rol gyi tshogs kyi son lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can
thams cad yongs su s+san par bya ba'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad byang chub kyi spyod pas rgyas par dgang pa'i smon lam rgyun mi
'chad pa'i rnam pa'i 'ephrul pa dang/ skya' sgrubs gnug cu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam rgya stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'dre thams cad ng rgyas par dragang zhange/ 'jig rten gyi khams
brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sems tsan gcagi chu ston pa'i sen lam la nam par 'phrul pa dang/ chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas chos kyi debyangs ma lus pa thams cad rgyas
par bkang ste/ chos kyi sen chen po byung pa las chos bdud rtsi'i char rab tu 'bab cing/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i glig snang pa dang/ yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra
mngon par 'byung bas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongos su doms par bya ba'i snyon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas rnam par rtsa pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kyi rgyal
pa'i sras btsu po de dag no/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so na lam la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub mas dpa'
rnams kyi spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bucu gang zhe na/'di ltar skye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can gyi
khams kyi yul du'ang snang ngo// kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sngon yul la mngon par dga' ba'ang yin lo/ bdud kyi spyod yul la gnas
@#// par yang snang ngo// kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ 'khor ba'i spyod yul las kyang ma/
du g.yo'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang yang ldan lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sed yul gyi rgyud kyang rgyun mi gcod
do kyi rgyal ba' sras byang chub sams dpa' rnams ni zhi ba dang/ rab tu zha ba dang/ nye bar zhi'oT sod yul dang yang ldan la/ soms na ma zha ba/ rab tu ma zhi ba/ nye bar ma 'apa'i
spyod yul can rnams kyang rnam por ma song ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang ba soms dar 'a rnams ni blang bo med pa dang/ dor ba med pa dang/ sro ba med pa dang/ ma 'phro ba dang/
mtshan ma med pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ rnam par mdemags pa dang/ bar sung dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can skyes pa dang mtshan ma thams cad du
dmags pa' sed yul can rnams kyi gnas na'ang snang ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stobs dang rnam par thar pa'i sad yul dang yang ldan la/ phyogs gcigi
pa'i spyod yul thams cad du'ang snang ngo// kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na sems can med pa' mtha'i srid yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can thams cad
yongs su swA na par bya ba'ang rnam par ma sdong ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ ye shes dben pa'i spyod/
yul dang yang ldan la/ 'jage rdzun gyi khams thams cad du skyo bar yang snang ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni di bzhin gshegs pa'i srid pa dang/ mngon par
'tshang rgya ba dang/ sangs rgyus kyi rgyan dang/ spyod yul thams cad kyang thob la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam dang/ choga'adra yongs su ston te/ kye rgyal
ba' sras bcu po de dag na/ byad rnapa sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi yeshes la rnam par 'phrul ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar tha dad pa yang dag papashes pa'i ye shes mi byed pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rmongs pa med pa'i
gzungs thams cad thob pa'i yi shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ smon lam shin tu rnam par gdon ma bye ba bstan pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su 'dzani
pa dang/ khong du chud par ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rang gi sems kyi yi gis pha rol gyi sems kyi ye shes dang sems gcige las sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang/
rnam par g.yo bar byed pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ bag chags
dang/ nyon mongs pa'i nd la gang dang 'byor ba'i sman yang dag par gtod pa'i yi shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la skad tsamigatsage gis
'jug pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs thams cad la chags pa med pa'i yo shes yangs pa sems can gzhan gyis thob par byed pa'i ye
shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ thogs pa med pa'i sems kyi skad cig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gro ba thams cad du yongs su ston pa'i yishes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/
sems can gcig gi 'du shes kyis/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang bya ba la mngon sum du ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can gcig gi sgra
dbyangs kyi sgra thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su ston pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi shes la
rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag naM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcugang zhe na ('di
ltar 'jage rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yongs su son kyang/ lus gcig tu dmigs pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ mos bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i mngon pa shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems
can gtsug gi sems la dmigs pas byang chub kyi rgyud brjod du med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la ma
par 'phrul pa dang/ dbyangs gcig gse 'dzage rton gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed tsang/ sku rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad du shes par byed pas/ sems can gzhan
gyi sems kyi rgyud du phyin par byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthar thug ra 'i bskal pa sams kyi skad cage gcig
gas rjes su dran zhing shes pas/ las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du ston cing/ sems can gyis go bar byed pa'i mtho rar shes ba la rnam par
'phrul pa dang/ 'dzagi rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan par bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'i mngon/
[8/ g]@#// par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi byang chub tu spyod pa'i smon lam yang dag pa bskyed pa dang/ chos kyi snang ba rab tu 'gye ba'i
ka mngon par shes pa la ma bar 'phrul pa dang/ lha dang/ grudang/ gnod spyin dang/ dra ze dang/ lham yin ngang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po
dang brgya byin dang/ tshangs ba dang/ 'jig rten gyimagon po thams cad kyis mngon par shes ba nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras mdoran/ byang chub sems dpa' na mngon par shes pas chos thams cad la yang dag pa gzhol ba yin te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa
la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pas/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rdul nyan tu phra ba gcig tu 'dzud pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rdul ngashin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyangs thams cad
[; ]dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chu'i phung po chen po ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu blags te/
chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro'ang sems can la gnod par ma 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med/
pa'i yang brjod du med pa rang gi lus su btsud de/ bya ba thams cad yangs su ston pa la mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khor lug dang rdo rje'i ri bsam
gyis mi khyab pa thams cad bsdu'i khung bu gcig tu bres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro'ang/ sems can rnams snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i rje 'khrul la rnam par
'phrul pa dang/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskal pa gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te// bskal pa gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
bskal pa ba du ba dang 'jig pa ston kyang/ sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chus 'jig pa
yongs su bstan pa dang/ ma dang rlung gis 'jig pa yongs su bstan kyang/ sims can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rje 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad 'tshig cing chu dang/ me dang/ rlung gis 'jig kyang/ lengs sred dang nye bar sredapa tha mas cad kyis yongs su gang bar byas shing sems can
la kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa lag pa'i mthil gyis blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med par bkod kyang/ sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yongs su bstan pas/
sems can go bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di deg ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bsu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin/
par bya ba dang/ 'dul ba mi gtong bas sems can gyi stobs la rnam bar 'phrul pa dang/ nam mkha' brjod du mdo nga 'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad rgyun rnam par phye bas brgyan
par yongs su ston pas zhing gi stebs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ lus thams cad lus med par 'jug pas chos kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pas bsal
pa'i skyebs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang gnyid kyis leg pa sangs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
skyad cing rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yang dag par sgrol bas sangs rgyas kyi stebs la rnam par 'phrul
po dang/ chos thams cad badag po med par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir rang byung gi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa drang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yegs shes ma lus par/
mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas sAng rje chen pa'i sems la rnam par 'phrul
ba'i kye rgyal ba sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kyargyal ba'i sras sems can la rnam par 'phrul pa bzung ba mnachad/
stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa yan chad kyi bar du/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rnam par
'phrul pa bcu pa de dag thob par gyur pa de ni/ 'dod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mi 'dod na mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o//
@#// 'dod na mngon par 'tshang yang rgya la/ spyod pa'i ng rgyun mi gcod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nisnyen
lam chen pos byung ba ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa// yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// kye rgyalakha'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtsa ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi lus la zhing gi lus byin gyis rlob pa byed kyang/ sems can
gyi lus 'byed par mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba dung po'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi lus lasoms can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang/ zhing gi lus
'dres par yang mi byed pa de na rnam par rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi sku la sems can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi
sku dma'i bar mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su ston kyang

nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bzhi pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i lus la mngon par 'otshang rgya ba'i lus ]
0/ yongs su ston kyang/ spyod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa de ni rnam par rtse ba lnga pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i lus la/
spyod pa yongs su ston kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa skye bar len par yang mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba drug pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su ston kyang/ mya ngan las 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa mi skyod pa de ni rnam par skye ba bdun pa'o// kyi
rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la mya ngan las 'dus pa yongs ston kyang/ yongasasu mya ngan las 'dul bas shin tu mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed pa de ni/
rnam par rtse ba brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag bzhin du 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'greng
pa dang/ 'dug pa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su ston kyang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mnyam pa nyer 'khrug par mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba dgu pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drun gnas chos thos nas lus kyang mi snang bar mi byed la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'kher brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa gzhan dang gzhan du lus rnam par dgod pas ldang yang lus tha dad par yang mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin
tha dad par yang mi byed l/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos rtan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing kun chub par byed la/ ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing/
chos dri ba bzung ba'i rgyun kyang ma gcod de/ de de ltar mnyam par gzhag bzhin du lus mi snang bar yang mi byed la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang sgo mngon par sgrub pa re re las kyang
brjod dumar pa'i yang brjod du mad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang sgo mngon par sgrub cinge de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang/ byang chub sams dpa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par bsgrub pa'i mthun gang yang med pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bcu pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par
rtsa ba sta/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur kha dag ga
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di deg ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ bcu gang zhe nA/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug par sems can
tsa la yongs su ston pa'i yul dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dum dang mngon par sgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang/
sems can gyi khams thams cad dusal pa mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par sgrub pa
dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang/ nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par sgrub pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'khorab r mngon par sgrub pa dang/ 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon
par sgral ba'i yul dang sems can gcig gi skad du brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan par mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas lus kun tu ston cing
lus gcig tu byin gyis brlab pa dang/ lus rnam pa thu dad pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang/ lus gcig gise chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang/
sems can thamasacad kyi sems bskyang pa'i skad cig re re la mtha' yas pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub cing/ rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i yul la// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ de drag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i lul bla
na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag ga/ pa/ bam po brgyadanu pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di de ga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi stobs te bcu gang zhon/ 'di ltar 'jig rten thams rgyad dang 'du 'dzimed pa'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad l skyid lug pa med par bya ba'i phyir/
lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyire sbyor ba'i stobs dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
soms dang spyod pa rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ya shes kyi stobs dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir se na lam gyi stobs dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
par rgyun chad pa med par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs dang/ theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung bar kun tu bstan pa dang theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir theg pa'i stobs
dang sku'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang/
bya sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgyu ba dang ma 'khrul ba'i phyir byang chub kyi stobs dang/ chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa pa rab ng
po ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
stobs de/ de dag la kha/nas shing byang chub sams dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa' yeshes dang/ stobs bcudang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ba dag/
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'jigs pa ste/ banu gang zhi na/ 'di ltar skye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems
dpa' rnams ni sgo thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du shar phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dang nub phyogasanas ston pa la la zhig bdag gi gan du
byon te/ bgro ba chen po brgya stong rab tu bshad par gyuranA/ bdag gis de gzung bar mi nus snyam du ma sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyubang rjes su mi mthong ngo//
rgyu'ang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jig pa chen pa'i dem pa thob cing/ ba rtan la zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ci 'dod pa de drise shes kyis skabs 'byed pa 'di no
mi 'jigs pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na ya gi dang/ na brjod pa dang/ sgra dang/ skadu thams cad kyi mtshams
sbyarakha rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du shar phyogs
ngo byang phyogs dang/ lha phyogs dang/ nub phyogs nas la la zhig 'ongs te/ bdag la chos kyi she tsam chen po zhige se par gyur na/ bdag gis lan mi len pa
snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgya'ang rjesasu mi mthong ngo// rgyu'ang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen pa'i dem pa thob cing/ bge ba thams cad kyi dri ba
yongs su dri ba ci yod pa bstan pa dang/ 'jigs shing spu ldang ba med par byes lo gang 'dod pa de dag dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni me 'jigs pa gtes pa'od kyi
rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dba' rnams ni stong pa'i chos khong du chud par rtogs pa yin te/ bdag dang/ bdag gi dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa dang/ tshor
ba pa dang/ srog dang gso ba dang/ gang zag dang/ phung pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched du lta ba dang bral te/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su song ba de dag 'di
snyam du bdag la la la zhig gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis gnod par bya ba 'am/gcig tu mi 'gyur ba 'amasam dusams pa med de/ byang chub sems da pas mtshon ma'ang rjes su/
mi mthong de// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'altar skyes bu dam pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/ mtshan ma'ang rjes su ma mthong bas mi 'jigs pa
chen po'i dam pa thob cing/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon du 'dor ba la rab tu brtan pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs te/ sangs rgyas kyi snang bas nye bar brtan cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ tshul la rab tu
gnas la/ spyod lam rnam par ma brtags shing ji ltakha bzhin du gnas pas de dag 'di snyam du bdag gi sed lam la la la zhig gis brgal bar mi 'gyuraram snyam du mi soms te/
byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma'ang rjes sum methong ngo// mtsha nama'ang rjes mu ma mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dem pa thob cing/ 'khor gyi nang du phyin nas chos ston pa 'di ni
[“]ma 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid shin tudag cing yongs su dag pa dang/ gtsang ba dang//
gtsang sbra dang/ des pa dang ldan zhin ngan par spyod pa dang/ ngan du byed pa dang/ ngan du smra ba dang bral ba yin te/ de dag na 'di snyam du bdag gi lus drang/ ngag
dang yid kyi las la la la zhag gis brgal bar mi 'gyur ba 'am snyam dum sems/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mal nga rjes su mim thong ngo/ mtshan ma'ang spros su mi mthed pA/
'ag pa dang bral zhing ma 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing/ sems can gzhan tshes la sbyor ba byed pa 'danam 'jigs pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
rnams n legan rdo rje rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs pas los su bsrung ba chen po thob cing/ lho dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin gyis rtag tu rim gror bya ba yin/
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon bo rnams kyis rtag tu phyag bya ba lani/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag
la bdud dam/ bdud kyi su gtogs pa'i lha 'am/ mu stegs can nam/ mu stegs spyod ba pa dang/ kun tu rgyu ba dag gam/ sems can dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa la la
zhig 'ongs shing/ bar chad byed bar m 'gyur ram zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dang sa mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo// mtshan ma'ang rjes su ma mthong bas 'dzagrwa
[s/ ]pa dang bral zhing/ mi 'jigs pa dam pa chen po thob pas dga' zhing yid bde ba dang ldan par/ byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad la nan tan du byed pa 'di nam bajigs pa drug pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyus kyis bsngags pa'i dran pa rab tu thob cing dran pa'i dbang po mchog dang ldan bas lo sa su rmongs pa med pa yin te/de dag
'di sAm du bdag cag gis ches kyi tshig dang la ge byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba la la zhig yongs su ma zin pa 'am/chud za bar
'gyur zhing nub par gyur pa med dam zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma'ang rjes su ma mthong ngo// mtshan ma'ang rjes su ma mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral
zhing/ mi 'jigs pa chen po' dem pa thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung ba'i thare nan tan du byed pa 'di na mi 'ges pa bdun pa'o//kyi rgyal ba'i
sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs dang shes rab dang/ ye shes khong du chud par rtogs shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog thob pas/rgyunam 'chad par
sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed cing/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu smon lam dang bsam ba chen bo ra na tu gtang ste sems can rnams la snying rjechen po bskyed las ched du bsau te/
ba@#// 'jig rten gyi gnas 'dod pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa can du skye ba bzung zhing 'dod pa'i dga' ba la rtse ba dang/ 'khor gyi longs spyod chen po se
can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du bdag gis yongs su bzung bar byed kyang/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag sems can gyi 'du 'dzi'i gos pas yongs su shes par gyur te/ byang chub
sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ thobs pa'i bar chad dam/
gcig tum 'gyur ram zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rgyu'ang rjes su mim thong ngo// kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'du rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa'i phyi'i/ sa thams cad lo dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa dag ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrug ba tham
cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur brjes surtsi mthong ngo// rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol
phyin pa dam pa thob pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kyi skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du skye ba gzung bar smon 'am rab tu 'debs te/'dinam 'jigs pa brgyad pa'o//
kyi rgyal ba' sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma nyams shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
pa dgasta/ de dgan thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sas kyi stobs dang shugs la gnas8shing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus thams cad kyi cho ga dang sprong lam yo sa su ston kyang de dag/
'di snyam du bdag cag nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ gcig gis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram sAm dusems pa med de/byang chub sems dpas rgyu'ang rjes su ma mthong ngo//
rgyu'ang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rolo tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas/theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston cing/ theg pa chen po rigs mnyam
bo nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di na mi 'jigs pa dgu pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pas dkar bo 'i ches yongs su 'dus
pa yin/ mngon par shes pa dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzo gas pa yin/ rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu brtan pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ rdzu 'phrul la mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/
spyod pa nye bar blangs de'ang rgyun mi gcod de/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can yang yongs su smin par ma gyur la/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
khyu mchog ga ma thu phyung ba ston par mazhus pa 'am/ gcig tum 'gyur ram zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dbus rgyur nga rjes su mi mthong ngo// rgyu'ang rjes suma mthong bas
'jigs pa dang bral zhing/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas/ sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin dusangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su ston te byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ng rgyun mi gcod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen pos skye ba'ang rgyanami gcod cing/ byang chub sems dpas lo sasu smin par bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod de/
'di ni ma 'jigs pa bcu pa'o/[”]kyi rgyal ba' sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub samasar 'a rnams kyis 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams m 'dza?gs pa chen/
bo bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' m 'jigs ba las kyang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa 'chos m 'dres pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams m bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa
rnams la brtson zhing gtong ba yongs sug dong ba la 'jus pa dang bral ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dang ga la tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad rab tu btsal ba yin/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs
la bsam pa ma bsgul ba yin/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan la dus thams rud du phyir mi ldog pa ni/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa la ma shes dang ldan la 'dzug pa thams cad yongs su
spangs pa yin/ shes rab kyis shin tu byung zhing sdig pa'i lta ba dang brag nga lan te/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa 'dan/byang chub sems dang ba rnams
kyim 'dres pa'i chos te// de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang mthun ra 'dano/ byang chub shems dpa'i sa 'dres pa 'chos dang po'i kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can
gyi khams yongs su sdud cing/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang/ chos kyi sbyin pa yongs sugatong ba'i ngang tshul can bzhi 'dzum pa/ snyan par smra ba/ tshig 'jam pa/ sems can
thams cad kyi sems mngon par dga' ba// don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhani la rab tu sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi don la nga du chud par byad pa/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med pa//
sems can thams cad la snyoms bar den du sems pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par soms can gyi khams yongs su bsdu ba'i bya nan tan du byed pa de ni/ byang chub sany+tsa
dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ de ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i lem dang mthun pa 'donaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ches ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//
kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na yongs su bsngo ba'atshul la mkhas shing/ rnam par sman pa la re ba med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song bar yongs su bsgo/
zhing 'jig rten gyi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la yo brngam pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas pashing sems can gyi don du yongs su bsngoste/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsal ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yongashes de ltar tshol zhing sems can gyi don yongs su tshol ba 'di// byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste// 'di no byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i
pha rol tu phyin ba'i dam pa thob pas/ sems can gyi rjes su 'brang zhing 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lam la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan te/ 'phags pa'i spyod
yul la mngon du lhas la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyi phyogs te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson zhing/ bdag
gi bde ba la chags pa med de/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa la goms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par ldang ba la mkhas
bas rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzan thob cing/ 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan te/ 'khor ba la bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'i 'du de bas chen po thob pa dang/
bdud kyi khyim thams caran gnas pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang chen po yongs su ston cing/ skye ba'i skye mched thams cad
du gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur la/ zhags pa 'thub pa'i rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi lta ba dang bral te/ 'jig rten pa'i rang btso dang/ sngags dang/ gtsug lag dang/ yi ge dang/
shod thabs dang/ grangs dang/ sa dang/ rang gi rtsedamo dang/ 'geg rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su ston cing// bud med kyi tshig dang/ mtshan ma dang [$]gas dang/
sgyu rtsi la thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas ba/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyan pa dang/ dpyad pa dang/ dro ba dang/ brtag pa shin tu bstan pa'i pa
de' tu phyin yi mchol them pa/ 'jig rtan pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'a mchog thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ngor blta ba dbang dang ldan pa dang/
du @#// rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang spyod lam yongs su ston pa// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'tshang
rgya ba skad cig skad cig tu ston pa spyod pa'i rgyan lo ngas su mi gcod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'isras de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang/ bstan pa 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i ches te/ 'don byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres ba bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zung dang rtogs la zhi
la mkhas shing ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas kyang 'khor ba'i sgo yongs su ston ba/
ba sems can med pa'i mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ma btang ba/ shin tu dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang nyon mongs pa'i
'bar ba sems can la yongs su ston pa// chos kyi ngashes gcig tu sdug pa'i lus dang ldan pa nga sems can gyi sgo mtha' yas pa yos su ston la/ bsam gtan chen po la bsam
gtan 'cha' yang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhingel ngas spyod par sems can la rnam par ston pas gcig tu dga' khor dga' zhing mos pa/ khams gsum pa thams
wa/ cad las phyir bltas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma gtang ba/ rtag tu chos kyi dga' bas dga' zhing mos kyang lha'i bu mo brgya phrag stong gi sgra rab tu byung//
ba dang rtse ba// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang dge ba'i mchog brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan yang dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ston pa rtag tu kha na ma sbe
ba med pa'i las dge ba spyad kyang sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi sa gnas dang/ gshani rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'ang longs su ston pa// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus las gyen du ma g.yos pa dgaste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes su mad
pa dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par dga' na/ sems can byis pa ga zhun gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'drin rung
chub sems dar 'i tshes ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams n lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid la bas sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste/ las shin tu
dag par spyod tsang srog gcod pa dang bral bas/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i bar dang bral bas/ byams pa phun sum tshogs shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa yan taM/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
bya@#// de ltar lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'din byang chub sems
dba'i chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams na snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing/ sems can thams cad
kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung bo rang gi lus len par mkhas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems can
gyi don du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ sems can gyi khams thams cad dgrol ba la zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtsi zhing yongs su longs spyod
pa la chags pa med pa'i yad dang ldan pas dad rtagatusems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po la dgrol ba lasa mngon bar bag paste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar sAng rje chen po'i
tshu stobs yongs su ma gtong ba bdenaM/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste// 'dazhe byang chub goms dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
byang chub sems dpa' rnams n 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba ste/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis phyag bya ba/ 'gro
[58 ]ba thams cad mthong bar smon pa/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dgaste/ kyirgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dba'
rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha' lan ma tho bamed pa dang ldan zhing/ yongs su dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyis sred pa sa/ de'i phyir de dag ma thong bas 'gro ba thams cad ma ngegs pa yin/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar mngon par dga' ba de'i/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa sta/ 'din byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres ba/
brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sams dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brtan ba dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i ge cha shin tu bgos pas/ de dag ji ltar nyon mongs

gang byas pa'i spyi bo'i 'du 'dzi dang ji ltar brtan tam/ 3na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyin ng du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sams rin po che bzang po 'od dang ldan
pa de 'jig par mi byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di lta ste/ dperan nor bu rin po che chen po rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba chu dang bar byed pa na pad+mo'i rdzing bu ji ltar rogs kyang rung ste//
nang du bcug na nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing bzang ba de nyid rnam par mi srong ste/ chude thams cad kyang rog pamed par rab tu dang bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub
[y ]/soms dpa' lang byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzis ji ltar brten kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che 'od gsal zhing snang ba bzang bo de chud zos par mi byed de/
sems can de dag kyang ston mos pa'irog ba de la zlog cing/ thums cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che 'od gsal zhing snang ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ji ltar nyon
mongs bar gyur kyang rung/ byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi ji ltar brten tam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
rin po che de nyid 'jig par mi byed pa dazhi/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi chos la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa ste/ rang byung gi ye shes dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing go 'phang skyon med pa
la gnas kyang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring dum spong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gror bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod de/ de ltar tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang/
'gro ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten pa las phyir mi ldog cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gror bya brgyun mi bcod pa den u0f7a/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa/
ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma 'dres pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i chos ma 'dres pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag ge kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems/
dpa 'a rnams kyi las te// bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i las dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang//
byang chub sems dpa'i grogs thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu bya ba'i las dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i las dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i
dus thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par yongs su gzung ba'i las dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas ma g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
las dang/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer dgye ba'i 'od kyi las dang/ pad+mo'asnying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'khod pa yongasasu bstan pa'i 'od zer gyi las dang/
mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bzung bas/ dkana mchog gsum gyi rogs rgyunam gcod pa'i las dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing
@#// chos bstan pa dang/ sems can gdul ba yang dag par sgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las dang/ nam 'dod pa dang/ namasams bskyad pan smon lam yongs su rdzogs par
sems can la yang dag par ston pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi las so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag// byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
sams dpa' rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i 'phrin las rgya chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi lus te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa mad pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad du ma dmigs pa med
pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus ni 'ongs pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis dgags pa jalte ba bzhin du/ byang chub sums dpa'i lus na bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten
gyi badren pa rnam par dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o// phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni
rgyun mi zad pa'o// bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni brtan pa'o// bdud kyi rgol po thams cad kyis me bsgul bas/ byang chub sems
0 da pa'i lus ni sra ba'o/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan kyis shin tu rnam par dag par snang bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po
mthar thug pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// 'das pa dang/ ma khyen pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam
pa nyid thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni kun tu song ba'o// kyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te// de dag la gnas
shing byang chub sems dwapa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi zad pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ pacu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kyi las dang/ sems can gyi
khams thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang/ skya ba thams cad du gnas pa'i lus kyi las dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsams cad lag pa gcig gis kun tu kheb par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang/
khor yug dang rdo rje'i re thams cad lag pa gcig gis nyug pa'i lus kyi las dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus 'jig pa dang/ 'byung ba
yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad lus gtsakra gis yongs su 'dzin pa 'i lus kyi las dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad lus
mad par khong du chud pas zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu ston pa'i lus kyi las so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
lus kyi las te/ de dag la gnas bshing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi cho sa 'gro ba kun gyis rnam par rig par bya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag ge
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhani te/ bcu gang zhan/ 'di ltar nan tan dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang/ 'gro ba
thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i ring bzhin dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len kyang yongs su mi skyo bas snying rje chen po'i
rang bzhin dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi rang bzhin dang/ sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gcig tu 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang/ skya ba'i skye mched thams cad las 2pad+hag sa che sa kyi rang bzhin rang/ thams cad du sgo yongs su
ston pas thams cad kyi rang bzhane dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ye ngas su ston pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang/ nam 'dod pa'i dus su mngon par rdzo gas
par 'tshang rgyu bas byang chub kyi drab zhin no// kyi rgyul ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamus kyi rang bzhin te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sams dpa'
rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhane khrun mad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgya ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi ngag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can h+phams cad bad par byed pas/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi dag ni 'jam pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems sam
par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga gnas nyan pa'o// rang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed ba// byang chu ba sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag na mi brdzun pa'o//
rmi lamana'ang leg par sa smra bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgen po thams cad zilakyis
gnon pas/ byang chub sems dpa'o rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su skabaka
pa'o// chos bstan pa thams cad mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa 'o// sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas// byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi ngagan shan tu gsal ba'o// dus dang/ las dang/ rnam par sma na pa ra lta ba bzhin du yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sas dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad
pa'o bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa la 'jug par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la 'gro ba'o// kye rgyal ba sras bcud de dag
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyu ngeg ste/ dadag la gnas shing byang chub sams dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bu na mar pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dug ge/ kyi
rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sams dpa'i ngag de'ang las rnam par dag pa khacus yongs su sbyangs pa lan te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'diltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dug
pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i tshog sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang/
[s ]sngon gyi ma par ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang/ dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang/ sgra chen pos
de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rjod pas yongs su dag pa dang/ bsam pa thag pas ngems can gzhan la chos
kyi sbyin pas sdud pas yongs su dag pa dang/ glu'i dbyangs dang/ rol mo brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod bas yongs su dag/
pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sa mngon sum du chos thos nas rang gi lus 'bul bas yongs su dag pa dang/ byang chub bams dpa'i tshes sa pa thams cad las ches
thos nas ralegro bya ba'i phyir/ bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su gtong bas yongs su dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'isras byang chub sems dpa'i ngeganolas rnam par dag pa
pacu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa de'ang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus
yongs su bzung bar 'byung sto/ bcu kang chen/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin/ klu'i dbang po dang/
gnod sbyin kyi dbang po dang/ dri za'i dbang po dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang/ mi 'am ce'i dbang po dang/
lta'abu chen po'i dbang po dang/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha khams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
pa chos kyi dbang po la sogs pa chos su smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpo'i ngagani yongs su 'dzin pa bcu
po de dag gis shin tu bzung bar 'byung ngo// kyi rgyal kha'i sras byang chub sams dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu bzung bar 'byung ba de'ang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub par
byad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can kyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do// dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed
do/ mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do// nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do// bag chags kyi khams stong bar byed do// bsam pa'i khams sbyong
bar byed do// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do// chos kyi kha la rgyas par byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa ni lam yang dag par rtogs par
byed de/ dgos pa bcu po de dag yongs su sgrub bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub pas sa dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ bcu gang zhe na/
'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing ston bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa mas ni nges lta bu 'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi shes rgya chen po'i rgyu
mtsho ma tha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams ni rgya mtsho lta bu 'o// 'jig rten las 'das ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tul tho ba la 'gro ba thams
cad rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ byung chub sa nas da ba'i sagasan re'i chen po lta bu 'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa mdacing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sam sa dpa'
rnams kyi sam sa ni nor bu rin po che lta bu 'o// chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas/ byang chub sags dpa' rnams kyi sams ni rdo rje lta bu 'o// bdud dang mu stags can gzhan dang
phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ma bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shagis pa lta bu// 'jig rten gyi tshos
thams cad kyis mi gos pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams ni ba blo lta bu 'o/ khaskal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang ma thong bar dka' khag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
sams ni ma tog u dum wa ra lta bu 'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang rab rib kyi rgyus pa sol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi sams ni nyom lta bu 'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyis brjod du chud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams ni bar snang lta bu 'o//kyi rgyal pa'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
sgri byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs rgya chen po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur
ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sa mas dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams
cad rab tu dgrol bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems da pa' sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sams bskyed
do// bag chags kyi 'tshams 'brel ba thams cad spang bar bya'o zhus byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// chos thams cad la tha tshom med pa thob par bya'o zhes byang
spyi chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya'o zhes byang chub gzims dpa' sems bskyed de// ngan song dang mi len pa tham
[ro]cad gcad par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sams bskyed de// byang chub
sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// sgra'i sbubs su 'jug pa thams cad kyang ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad du sangs
rgyus thams cad byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba bstan par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sams bskyed do// 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pas/ 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad du grags par bya bar chos kyi ra bla na med pa brdung bar bya'o zhes khyang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgya chen po'i 'phrin las kun mad pa rtsom par 'gyur pa
dgako/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste// bcugang zhen/ 'di ltar sams shin tu
yangs pa dang ldan pas naam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang/ mtha' dang dbus chad pa khong du chud pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang/ skad cig gcig
u@#// tu 'dzud pas dus gsum thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang/ gshegs pa dang/ skye ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/ rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor la
bskor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mngon sum du shes pas sangs rgyus skya ba thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang/ bag chags dang dbang ponam mkha' lta bur khong du chud/
bas sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rgyas par dragang pa dang/
sgyu ma'i dra kha rnam pa tha dad pa lta bur khong du chud pas mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par dgang ba dang/ rang bzhin mi dmigs pas mi skya khar rgyas par dgang ba dang/ rang gi sems dang
gozhan gyi sems la thogs pa med pas chags pa med par rgyas par dgang ba dang/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la mngon par rdzo gas par byang chub pa yongs su ston pa sa dbang gis rgyas
bar dgang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyas par dgang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rkyen bla na med pa 'a thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/ bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar dad pa phyir ldog pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni dga'
par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po mngon par mos pa'o// bya ba thams cad la thogs
pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'o// byang chu sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun ma gcod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
dbang po na gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po nashin tu phra ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi
dgos pa yongs su grub par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rgyun mi 'chad do// chos thams cad la rab tu rno ba'i phyir/ byang chub sams dpa' rnasu
kyi dbang pon rdo rje lta bu 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de sul la snang ba 'thob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po na rdo rje'i 'od 'bro ba ltar snang bar byed pa
de bzhin gshakas pa thams cad kyi sku dang lus gcig tu gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpang po ni tha mi dad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su zhugs
ba'i phyi'i/ byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi dbang po ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag ko
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltar byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams
cad kyis ma gos pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la bya ba dang ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa la rnams
kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yi shes su 'byung pa'i lam dang mthun pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa bdud dang/ mu stags can gazhan rung/ chu stags spyod pa'i rgol ba thams cad kyis ma 'phrogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi khasam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa chos
ji skad du thos pa yongs su mi gtong bas shin tu zin par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyi bsam pa skye ba'i sku mched thams cad kyis ma gos pas yongs
su nyams pa medra pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ye shes phra ba la zhugs pa'i yur zab pa dang byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi che sa
thams cad la shin tu brtson pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyi bsam pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad
mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa bla na mad pa yongs su rdzo gas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyi rgyal la' sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa
sta bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar byang chub sams dang 'a rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa la phyir mi ldog par dbang sgyur pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshul bstan pa la nem nur med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamos kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ston
lam dang spyod pa chen po'i rgyun yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug par bya ba la phul du phyin pa dang//
[rs ]@#// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas mngon sum du gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
lhag pa'i bsam pa chos sna tshogs kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pas rgya che ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi lhog pa'i bsam pa brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa sa
gtso bor gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam pa ra 'phrul pa'i rgyan thams cad kar dbang sgyur ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su gzung bas shan tu brtan pa dang/ byang chub sam sa dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa samos can
thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sdu/ de dag
la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag pa'i dgos pa bla na mad pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/
bam po brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di degani/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba sta/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'dilngar rnam par sun
[7 ]pa la re ba mad par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i sder ba dang/ su zhan la bar s pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi tshul khrims dang/ bslab pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i don tun dang/ sdom pa dang/ brtul zhugs su dang/ dka' thub thams cad du yi dam bcas pa la nan tan byed
pa'i sbyor ba dang/ bdag dang snga rol gyi 'du shes med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnod sa mas kyi grwa pa dang gshe ba thams cad rna la gzan cing/ sems can gyis
ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod pa'i sbyor ba dang/ lus dang/ ngag dung/ sams yang dag par skul sus brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
mas da pa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldeg pa'i sbyor pa dang/ 'dod pa'i 'khrug pa dang nyon mongs pa'i g.yog 'khor longs su spong bas/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting ngo 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa thams cad mngon par sgrub
pa'i skyo ba dang/ bsod nams bsags pa thams cad la skyo ba med pa sa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kying shes rab kyi nan tan sbyor ba dang/ sems can med pa la zhugs paso/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba
thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rang gi lus kyis len pa'i snying rje chen po las phyiram ldeg pa'i sbyor ba dang/ chags pa med par khong du chud pas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ khyung
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor ba dang/ sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du phyin par byed pas/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi/
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir ma lcog pu'i sbyor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba ste/ de drug la gnas shing byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shes chen po'i sbyor ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sros bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sams dpa'
rnams kyi mos pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bsgrub pa dka' ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang/ rgyan sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mes pa
zhi dang yid zhum pa med pas rgya chen po'i mes pa dang/ sa zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pas zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang/ sems rgya chen po skyed pas yangs pa'i mos pa dang/ sangs
[78 ]/ rgyus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang shugs su ldan pas rang gi skabs lu pa'i mos pa dang/ bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pas mi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang/ las kyi rnam par
sman pa la gcig tu nges pas shin tu gdon mi za pa'i mos pa dang/ rtsi 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pas mngon du gyur pa'i mes pa dang/ stobs dang mi ldan pa med pa'i phyi'i dus
gang du pad 'byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs papa'i tshang rgya bas/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par nod pa'i mos pa'o// kyi rgyal pa' sras bcu po de dag
ni byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyi mos pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyes pa blo na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dug go
kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten kyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa sta/ bcu gapanyen/ 'di ltar 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad 'jig na kyi khams gcig tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcagi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig
rtan gyi khams thams cad pad+mo'i gdan gcig la bzhugs pa'i de khanyani ka shekas pa'i sas yongs su khyab par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rtan gyi khen sa thams cad nam
@#// mkha'i rang bzhin du yang dag par bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyunagyis brgyan par mas pa la 'jug pa
dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i'u sa kyis rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad sku'i sbubs gcig tu
dgod par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de
bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi snying po byang chub kyis yongs su rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
thams cad du sgra'i dbyangs gcig gis go bar bya ba dang/ samasacan gyi khams thams cad kyi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pas tshim par bya bar mos pa la 'jug pa'o// kyi
rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa sta/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sams dpa' rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mos pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisams
can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad rang bzhin gyis lus med par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams
cad srams can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sams
can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gtsug gi lus yongs su zhugs par gyur par/
mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/
'jig rten gyi mgon po dang/ ci 'dod pa dang/ gar mos pa'i gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ cha byad du mngon par blta bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ cha byad du yongs su bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
yongs su brgyan par byin gyis brlab cing/ yongs su bstan par mos la la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang/ mtshan dang/ dab khyad
bzang po dang/ gzugs kyi sku sna tshogs kyi spyod lam dang/ tshul dang/ spyod pa yongs su bstan cing/ gzhan gyis rag par bya bar mos pa la 'jug pa 'o//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi soms can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhinagasha
pa'i regyes pa dang/ khyu mchog ku ma thu byung ba bla na med pa'i thol 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag
chags te/ bcu ga zhe ne/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi bag chags dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang/ sems can yongs su nabar phya'i bag chags dang/ sangs
rgyas lta ba'i bag chags dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags dang/ sngod pa'i bag chags dang/ smon lam gyi bag chags dang/ pha rol tu
byani ba'i bag chags dang/ chos mnyam pa nyid nges par rtogs pa'i bag tshogs dang/ spyod pa rnam pa tha drad pa'i bag chags so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang
chub sams dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sams dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa'i bag chags ma lus par sbyangs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
chen pos bag chags blugs su chud pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/
nyakhar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgyun migatse da ra 'o// lanu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams nye bar
len pa dang/ lhag ma med par yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar len pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa nye bar len pa dang/ mtsha na dang/ dpe byad bzang po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa dang/ sems can
thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po nye bar blangs te rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po nye bar len pa dang/ sems can phrams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde ba la rab tu dgod
pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po nye bar len pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i rgyun yang dag par bsdu la'i phur pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar len pa dang/ skyo thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i
phyir thabs mkhas pa nye bar len pa dang/ chags pa med pa 'i yi shes kyi phyir/ byang chub bar len pa dang/ mdor na thams cad mngon sum du shas bas mngon par shes par bya ba'i
